    14                                  ; Modified from 'iosys5.s' (28/12/2022, Retro DOS v4.1 Kernel's IO.SYS) file
    15                                  ; as below:
    16                                  ;    1) SYSINIT code has been changed from MSDOS 5.0 to MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS
    17                                  ;      (except DOUBLESPACE feature! Retro DOS does not use the DOUBLESPACE.)	
    18                                  ;    2) 'iosys6.s' is same with 'iosys5.s' except sysinit code.
    19                                  ;	(Also, MSDOS 5.0 & MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS are almost same except
    20                                  ;	SYSINIT and 'Starting MS-DOS' msg part of MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS.) 
    21                                  
    22                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    23                                  
    24                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Multisection binary file format (BIOSDATA & BIOSCODE sections)
    25                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan (Istanbul)
    26                                  
    27                                  ;Note: This code is a part of Retro DOS 4.0 kernel source code
    28                                  ;     (as included binary, 'IOSYS5.BIN') 
    29                                  ;     Equivalent of MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSCODE and BIOSDATA and SYSINIT
    30                                  ;						        (except MSLOAD code)  
    31                                        
    32                                  ;---- Retro DOS v2 (v3) boot sector loads RETRODOS.SYS (MSDOS.SYS)
    33                                  ;     at 1000h:0000h and loader (initialization) part of RETRODOS kernel
    34                                  ;     moves IO.SYS (DOSBIOSCODE & DOSBIOSDATA, 'IOSYS5.BIN') to 70h:0000h.
    35                                  ;     Then SYSINIT code to the next segment (46Dh for original MSDOS 5.0)..
    36                                  ;     SYSINIT code relocates itself and DOSBIOSCODE and MSDOS.SYS
    37                                  ;     (MSDOS5.BIN) according to request/setting in 'config.sys' file.
    38                                  
    39                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    40                                  
    41                                  ;bpbx		struc ;	(sizeof=0x19)	
    42                                  ;
    43                                  ;bytespersec	dw ?			; base 10
    44                                  ;secperclust	db ?			; base 10
    45                                  ;rsvdsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    46                                  ;numfats	db ?			; base 10
    47                                  ;rootdirents	dw ?			; base 10
    48                                  ;totalsize16	dw ?			; base 10
    49                                  ;mediaid	db ?
    50                                  ;fatsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    51                                  ;secpertrack	dw ?			; base 10
    52                                  ;heads		dw ?			; base 10
    53                                  ;hiddensecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    54                                  ;hiddensecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    55                                  ;totalsecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    56                                  ;totalsecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    57                                  ;
    58                                  ;bpbx		ends

   150                                  ;	  block of io.sys is, in fact, at cluster 2. This would be saving

   152                                  ;
   153                                  ;============================================================================
   154                                  ;
   155                                  ;     for dos 4.00, msload program has been changed to allow:
   156                                  ;	  1. 32 bit calculation,
   157                                  ;	  2. reading a fat sector when needed, instead of reading the whole
   158                                  ;	     fat sectors at once. this will make the boot time faster,
   159                                  ;	     and eliminate the memory size limitation problem,
   160                                  ;	  3. solving the limitation of the file size (29 kb) of io.sys0,
   161                                  ;	  4. adding the boot error message. show the same boot error message
   162                                  ;	     and do the same behavior when the read operation of io.sys
   163                                  ;	     fails as the msboot program, since msload program is the
   164                                  ;	     extention of msboot program.

   271                                  ;

   277                                  ;   FirstSectorH = input AX, if an extended boot record.;j.k.
   278                                  ;   TotalSectorsL = maximum sector number in this media ;j.k.
   279                                  ;   TotalSectorsH = high word of the above
   280                                  ;   HiddenSectorsL = hidden secotrs

   469 000000A5 09C0                    		or	ax, ax  ; TotalSectorsL (16 bit total sectors)
   470 000000A7 7505                    		jnz	short ext_boot_sec_2 ; (*)
   471                                  
   472                                  		; (32 bit total sectors)
   473 000000A9 89F0                    		mov	ax, si ; BigTotalSecs lw 
   474 000000AB AB                      		stosw	; TotalSectorsL	
   475 000000AC 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx ; BigTotalSecs hw
   476                                  ext_boot_sec_2:
   477 000000AE AB                      		stosw	; TotalSectorsH or TotalSectorsL (*)
   478 000000AF 58                      		pop	ax ; ** ; HiddenSectorsL
   479                                  		;pop	word [FirstSectorH] ; * ; 1st data sector hw
   480 000000B0 59                      		pop	cx ; * ; [FirstSectorH] ; 1st data sector hw
   481 000000B1 890E[2200]              		mov	[FirstSectorH], cx
   482 000000B5 890E[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], cx ; **!**

   485                                  set_fat_start:
   486                                  		; 24/12/2022
   487                                  		; dx:ax = HiddenSectors
   488                                  		; bx = ReservSectors

   490 000000B9 01D8                    		add 	ax, bx
   491 000000BB 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
   492

   494                                  		;mov	[FatStartSecH], dx

   496 000000BE BF[2C00]                		mov	di, FatStartSecL
   497 000000C1 AB                      		stosw
   498 000000C2 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
   499 000000C4 AB                      		stosw		
   500                                  	
   501                                  ; Relocate
   502                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   503                                  ;
   504                                  ; NOTES:
   505                                  ;
   506                                  ;   Relocates the loader code to top-of-memory.
   507                                  ;
   508                                  ; INPUT:     none
   509                                  ;
   510                                  ; OUTPUT:    code and data relocated.
   511                                  ;	     AX,CX,SI,DI destroyed
   512                                  ;
   513                                  ; calls:     none
   514                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   515                                  ;
   516                                  ; Determine the number of paragraphs (16 byte blocks) of memory.
   517                                  ; this involves invoking the memory size determination interrupt,
   518                                  ; which returns the number of 1k blocks of memory, and then
   519                                  ; converting this to the number of paragraphs.
   520                                  ; Find out whether RPL code is present at top of memory and modify the
   521                                  ; available amount of memory in AX
   522                                  ; leave the number of paragraphs of memory in ax.
   523                                  ;
   524                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   525                                  ; copy code from start to top of memory.
   526                                  ;
   527                                  ; the length to copy is EndOfLoader
   528                                  ;
   529                                  ; jump to relocated code
   530                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   531                                  
   532                                  relocate:
   533                                  		; 24/12/2022
   534                                  		;cld
   535                                  
   536 000000C5 31F6                    		xor	si, si
   537 000000C7 89F7                    		mov	di, si
   538 000000C9 CD12                    		int	12h		; MEMORY SIZE -
   539                                  					; Return: AX = number of contiguous 1K blocks of memory
   540 000000CB B106                    		mov	cl, 6
   541 000000CD D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl		; Memory size in paragraphs
   542                                  
   543                                  ;------ Check if an RPL program is present at TOM and do not tromp over it
   544                                  
   545                                  		; 10/12/2022
   546                                  		; ds = 0
   547                                  		; 24/12/2022
   548                                  		; ds = cs
   549 000000CF 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
   550 000000D1 8EDB                    		mov	ds, bx		; ZERO
   551                                  		
   552                                  		;mov	bx, [DskAddr+44h] ; 2Fh*4 (Int 2Fh)
   553                                  		;mov	ds, [DskAddr+46h] ; 2Fh*4+2
   554                                  		; 10/12/2022
   555 000000D3 8B1EBC00                		mov	bx, [2Fh*4]	; (Int 2Fh)
   556 000000D7 8E1EBE00                		mov	ds, [2Fh*4+2]		
   557                                  
   558                                  		;cmp	word ptr [bx+3], 'PR'
   559                                  		; 09/12/2022
   560 000000DB 817F035250              		cmp	word [bx+3], 'RP' ; 'RPL'
   561 000000E0 750F                    		jnz	short Skip_RPL
   562 000000E2 807F054C                		cmp	byte [bx+5], 'L'
   563 000000E6 7509                    		jnz	short Skip_RPL
   564 000000E8 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; get TOM into DX
   565 000000EA B8064A                  		mov	ax, 4A06h	; (multMULT shl	8) + multMULTRPLTOM
   566 000000ED CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; Get new TOM from any RPL
   567 000000EF 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
   568                                  Skip_RPL:
   569                                  		; 24/12/2022
   570 000000F1 0E                      		push	cs
   571 000000F2 1F                      		pop	ds	; 25/12/2022
   572                                  
   573 000000F3 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
   574 000000F5 8B16[1200]              		mov	dx, [BytesPerSec] ; 24/12/2022
   575                                  		;mov	dx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
   576 000000F9 D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl
   577 000000FB 42                      		inc	dx
   578 000000FC 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
   579 000000FE A3[3000]                		mov	[FatSegment], ax ; 24/12/2022
   580                                  		;mov	[cs:FatSegment], ax ; This will be used for fat sector
   581                                  		; 22/12/2022
   582                                  		;mov	dx, EndOfLoader
   583 00000101 BA[9004]                		mov	dx, EndOfLoader+256
   584                                  				; loader size + temporary/local stack space (*)
   585 00000104 D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl
   586 00000106 42                      		inc	dx
   587 00000107 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
   588 00000109 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax	; ES:DI -> place be relocated.
   589                                  		; 22/12/2022
   590 0000010B 4A                      		dec	dx
   591 0000010C D3E2                    		shl	dx, cl	; convert paragraphs to bytes (*)	
   592                                  				; (stack pointer will be set to this offset)
   593                                  		; 24/12/2022
   594                                  		;push	cs
   595                                  		;pop	ds		; DS:SI -> source
   596                                  
   597 0000010E B9[9003]                		mov	cx, EndOfLoader
   598 00000111 F3A4                    		rep movsb
   599                                  
   600 00000113 06                      		push	es
   601 00000114 B8[1901]                		mov	ax, SetupStack
   602 00000117 50                      		push	ax		; Massage stack for destin of CS:IP
   603 00000118 CB                      		retf
   604                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   605                                  
   606                                  ; Start of relocated code
   607                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
   608                                  ;
   609                                  ; Move the stack to just under the boot record and relocation area (0:7c00h)
   610                                  ;
   611                                  
   612                                  SetupStack:	
   613                                  		; 22/12/202		; ...
   614                                  		;mov	ax, cs		; Start	of relocated code
   615                                  		;mov	ss, ax
   616                                  		;;mov	sp, NumHeads	; StackPtr offset
   617                                  		; 20/12/2022
   618                                  		;mov	sp, StackPtr	; StackPtr offset
   619                                  		
   620                                  ; 22/12/2022
   621                                  ; (set a temporary stack just above the relocated loader code)
   622                                  ; ((instead of using/reserving 256 bytes of stack space in 'IO.SYS' file))
   623                                  
   624                                  		; 22/12/2022
   625                                  		; cs = loader segment (relocated)
   626                                  		; dx = loader size + stack space (*) -paragraph aligned-
   627                                  
   628                                  		;cli
   629 00000119 8CC8                    		mov	ax, cs
   630 0000011B 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax	; 24/12/2022
   631 0000011D FA                      		cli 
   632 0000011E 8ED0                    		mov	ss, ax
   633 00000120 89D4                    		mov	sp, dx	; (*)
   634 00000122 FB                      		sti
   635                                  
   636                                  ; FindClusterSize
   637                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   638                                  ;
   639                                  ; INPUT:     bpb information in loaded boot record at 0:7c00h
   640                                  ;
   641                                  ; OUTPUT:
   642                                  ;
   643                                  ;	ds = 0
   644                                  ;	ax = bytes/cluster
   645                                  ;	bx = sectors/cluster
   646                                  ;	si destroyed
   647                                  ; calls:     none
   648                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
   649                                  ;
   650                                  ; get bytes/sector from bpb
   651                                  ;
   652                                  ; get sectors/cluster from bpb
   653                                  ;
   654                                  ; bytes/cluster = bytes/sector * sector/cluster
   655                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   656                                  
   657                                  FindClusterSize:
   658                                  
   659                                  ;for the time being just ASSUME the boot record is valid and the bpb is there.
   660                                  
   661                                  		; 24/12/2022
   662                                  		; ds = cs
   663                                  		;xor	ax, ax
   664                                  		;mov	ds, ax
   665                                  		;mov	ax, [7C0Bh]	; get bpb bytes/sector
   666                                  		; 24/12/2022
   667 00000123 A1[1200]                		mov	ax, [BytesPerSec]
   668                                  		;xor	bx, bx
   669                                  		;mov	bl, [7C0Dh]	; get sectors/cluster
   670                                  		;mul	bx
   671 00000126 F726[1400]              		mul	word [SecPerCluster]
   672                                  		;mov	[cs:ClusterSize], ax
   673                                  		; 24/12/2022
   674 0000012A A3[0400]                		mov	[ClusterSize], ax
   675                                  
   676                                  ; CalcFatSize
   677                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   678                                  ;
   679                                  ; NOTES:
   680                                  ;
   681                                  ;   Determine if fat is 12 or 16 bit fat. 12 bit fat if floppy, read mbr
   682                                  ;   to find out what system id byte is.
   683                                  ;
   684                                  ; INPUT:
   685                                  ;
   686                                  ; OUTPUT:
   687                                  ;
   688                                  ;   CS:FatSize = FAT_12_BIT or FAT_16_BIT
   689                                  ;   all other registers destroyed
   690                                  ;
   691                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   692                                  
   693                                  CalcFatSize:
   694                                  		; 24/12/2022
   695                                  		; ds = cs
   696 0000012D C606[2500]01            		mov	byte [Fatsize], 1
   697                                  		;mov	byte [cs:Fatsize], 1 ; FAT_12_BIT (assume)
   698                                  		;mov	dx, [cs:TotalSectorsH]
   699                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:TotalSectorsL] ; DX:AX = total disk sectors
   700 00000132 8B16[1E00]              		mov	dx, [TotalSectorsH]
   701 00000136 A1[1C00]                		mov	ax, [TotalSectorsL] ; DX:AX = total disk sectors
   702                                  		;;;		
   703                                  ; 24/12/2202
   704                                  %if 0
   705                                  		sub	ax, [ReservSectors]
   706                                  		;sub	ax, [cs:ReservSectors]
   707                                  		sbb	dx, 0		; DX:AX	= Total	avail sectors
   708                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:SecPerFat]
   709                                  		mov	bx, [SecPerFat]
   710                                  		shl	bx, 1		; (Assume 2 FATs)
   711                                  		sub	ax, bx
   712                                  		sbb	dx, 0
   713                                  		;mov	bx, [7C11h]	; Root directory entry count
   714                                  		mov	bx, [RootDirEntries]
   715                                  		mov	cl, 4
   716                                  		shr	bx, cl		; BX = Total directory sectors
   717                                  		sub	ax, bx
   718                                  		sbb	dx, 0		; DX:AX	= Sectors in data area
   719                                  %endif
   720                                  		; 24/12/2022
   721 00000139 2B06[2000]              		sub	ax, [FirstSectorL] ; total sectors - start of data
   722 0000013D 1B16[2200]              		sbb	dx, [FirstSectorH]
   723                                  				; DX:AX	= Sectors in data area
   724                                  		;;;
   725                                  		;xor	cx, cx
   726                                  		;mov	cl, [7C0Dh]	; Sectors per cluster
   727 00000141 8B0E[1400]              		mov	cx, [SecPerCluster] ; *#*
   728 00000145 50                      		push	ax
   729 00000146 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
   730 00000148 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
   731 0000014A F7F1                    		div	cx  ; *#*
   732                                  		; 24/12/2022
   733                                  		;;mov	[cs:TempH], ax	; AX = Total number of clusters
   734                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax
   735 0000014C 58                      		pop	ax
   736 0000014D F7F1                    		div	cx  ; *#*
   737 0000014F 3DF60F                  		cmp	ax, 4086	; 4096-10
   738 00000152 7205                    		jb	short ReadInFirstClusters ; 12 bit FAT
   739                                  		;mov	byte [cs:Fatsize], 4 ; FAT_16_BIT
   740 00000154 C606[2500]04            		mov	byte [Fatsize], 4 ; FAT_16_BIT
   741                                  
   742                                  ; ReadInFirstClusters
   743                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   744                                  ;
   745                                  ; NOTES: read the start of the clusters that covers at least IbmLoadSize
   746                                  ;	 fully.  for example, if sector/cluster = 2, and IbmLoadSize=3
   747                                  ;	 then we are going to re-read the second cluster to fully cover
   748                                  ;	 msload program in the cluster boundary.
   749                                  ;
   750                                  ; INPUT:
   751                                  ;   IbmLoadSize - make sure this value is the same as the one in
   752                                  ;		  msboot program when you build the new version!!!!!
   753                                  ;
   754                                  ;   SecPerCluster
   755                                  ;   ClusterSize
   756                                  ;   FirstSectorL
   757                                  ;   FirstSectorH
   758                                  ;
   759                                  ; OUTPUT: msload program is fully covered in a cluster boundary.
   760                                  ;	  ax = # of clusters we read in so far.
   761                                  ;
   762                                  ; calls:     ReadSectors
   763                                  ; logic:
   764                                  ;	ax; dx = IbmLoadSize / # of sector in a cluster.
   765                                  ;	if dx = 0 then ok. (msload is in a cluster boundary.)
   766                                  ;      else		   (has to read (ax+1)th cluster to cover msload)
   767                                  ;	read (ax+1)th cluster into the address after the clusters we
   768                                  ;	read in so far.
   769                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   770                                  
   771                                  ; 09/12/2022
   772                                  ; BiosStart equ 51Ah ; AX = IO.SYS starting cluster
   773                                  ; IbmLoadSize equ 3  ; AX = Number sectors in MSLOAD
   774                                  ; BiosOffset equ 700h ; Address where loader was read in
   775                                  	
   776                                  ReadInFirstClusters:
   777                                  		; 24/12/2022
   778                                  		;;mov	ax, [BioSStart]
   779                                  		;mov	ax, [51Ah]	; IO.SYS First Cluster
   780                                  		;dec	ax		; Root dir buffer at 500h (segment=0)
   781                                  		;			; IO.SYS first cluster ptr at 51Ah
   782                                  		;dec	ax		; AX = word [51Ah] - 2
   783                                  		;;mov	[cs:CurrentCluster], ax ;  Initialize to this cluster
   784                                  		; 24/12/2022
   785                                  		; ds = cs
   786                                  		;mov	[CurrentCluster], ax
   787                                  		; 24/12/2022
   788                                  		; [CurrentCluster] = word [51Ah] - 2
   789                                  
   790                                  		;mov	ax, IbmLoadSize
   791 00000159 B80300                  		mov	ax, 3		; Load the 3rd and other IO.SYS	sectors
   792 0000015C F6F1                    		div	cl ; *#*
   793                                  		;div	byte [SecPerCluster]
   794                                  		;;div	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]
   795                                  					; AL = total cluster read in
   796                                  					; AH = remaining sectors in last cluster
   797                                  		; 10/12/2022
   798 0000015E 20E4                    		and	ah, ah
   799                                  		;cmp	ah, 0
   800 00000160 7433                    		jz	short SetNextClusterNum	; next cluster
   801                                  
   802 00000162 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
   803 00000164 50                      		push	ax		; AX = total clusters in the loader
   804                                  					; already read in
   805                                  ; 24/12/2022
   806                                  %if 0		
   807                                  		mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorL] ;	Put starting sector of disk data
   808                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], cx    ; area in StartSecH:StartSecL
   809                                  		mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
   810                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], cx
   811                                  		mul	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]
   812                                  		add	[cs:StartSecL], ax ; Add number of sectors already loaded
   813                                  		adc	word [cs:StartSecH], 0 ; to start sector
   814                                  		;mov	ax, [BiosStart]
   815                                  		mov	ax, [51Ah] ; AX = [51Ah] = IO.SYS 1st clust
   816                                  		dec	ax
   817                                  		dec	ax
   818                                  		xor	bx, bx
   819                                  		mov	bl, [cs:SecPerCluster]
   820                                  		mul	bx		; DX:AX = logical start sector
   821                                  		add	[cs:StartSecL], ax
   822                                  		adc	[cs:StartSecH], dx
   823                                  					; abs start sector for next read of
   824                                  					; the rest of the last loader cluster
   825                                  		pop	ax
   826                                  		push	ax
   827                                  		mul	word [cs:ClusterSize]
   828                                  		;mov	di, BiosOffset
   829                                  		mov	di, 700h	; IO.SYS offset	(segment = 0)
   830                                  		add	di, ax
   831                                  		xor	ax, ax
   832                                  		mov	es, ax		; ES = segment 0
   833                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]
   834                                  					; Read in the entire last cluster
   835                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax
   836                                  		call	ReadSectors
   837                                  		pop	ax		; AX = total clust read	by boot	loader
   838                                  		inc	ax		; AX = total clust read	in now
   839                                  SetNextClusterNum:			; ...
   840                                  		inc	ax		; AX = total clusters read in based 2
   841                                  		add	[cs:CurrentCluster], ax
   842                                  		dec	ax		; CurrentCluster = Last	cluster	read
   843                                  					; AX = number of clusters loaded
   844                                  %endif
   845                                  		; 24/12/2022
   846                                  		; ds =cs
   847                                  		;mov	cx, [FirstSectorL] ; Put starting sector of disk data
   848                                  		;mov	[StartSecL], cx    ; area in StartSecH:StartSecL
   849                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
   850                                  		;mov	[StartSecH], cx
   851                                  		; [StartSecL] = [FirstSectorL] ; **!**
   852                                  		; [StartSecH] = [FirstSectorH] ; **!**
   853                                  		
   854                                  		; 24/12/2022
   855                                  		; cx = [SecPerCluster]  ; *#*
   856                                  
   857                                  		;mul	byte [SecPerCluster]
   858 00000165 F6E1                    		mul	cl ; *#*
   859 00000167 0106[0600]              		add	[StartSecL], ax ; Add number of sectors already loaded
   860 0000016B 8316[0800]00            		adc	word [StartSecH], 0 ; to start sector
   861                                  
   862                                  		;mov	ax, [51Ah] ; AX = [51Ah] = IO.SYS 1st clust
   863                                  		;dec	ax
   864                                  		;dec	ax
   865 00000170 A1[1000]                		mov	ax, [CurrentCluster]
   866                                  		; ax = word [51Ah] - 2
   867                                  		
   868                                  		;;xor	bx, bx
   869                                  		;;mov	bl, [SecPerCluster]
   870                                  		;mov	bx, [SecPerCluster]
   871                                  		;mul	bx		; DX:AX = logical start sector
   872 00000173 F7E1                    		mul	cx  ; [SecPerCluster]  ; *#*
   873                                  
   874 00000175 0106[0600]              		add	[StartSecL], ax
   875 00000179 1116[0800]              		adc	[StartSecH], dx
   876                                  					; abs start sector for next read of
   877                                  					; the rest of the last loader cluster
   878 0000017D 58                      		pop	ax
   879 0000017E 50                      		push	ax
   880 0000017F F726[0400]              		mul	word [ClusterSize]
   881                                  		;mov	di, BiosOffset
   882 00000183 BF0007                  		mov	di, 700h	; IO.SYS offset	(segment = 0)
   883 00000186 01C7                    		add	di, ax
   884 00000188 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
   885 0000018A 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax		; ES = segment 0
   886                                  		; 24/12/2022
   887                                  		;mov	al, [SecPerCluster]
   888                                  		;			; Read in the entire last cluster
   889                                  		;mov	[SectorCount], ax
   890 0000018C 890E[0E00]              		mov	[SectorCount], cx ; [SecPerCluster]  ; *#*
   891                                  		
   892 00000190 E86700                  		call	ReadSectors
   893 00000193 58                      		pop	ax		; AX = total clust read	by boot	loader
   894 00000194 40                      		inc	ax		; AX = total clust read	in now
   895                                  SetNextClusterNum:			; ...
   896 00000195 40                      		inc	ax		; AX = total clusters read in based 2
   897 00000196 0106[1000]              		add	[CurrentCluster], ax
   898 0000019A 48                      		dec	ax		; CurrentCluster = Last	cluster	read
   899                                  					; AX = number of clusters loaded
   900                                  		
   901                                  ; SaveLoadedBios
   902                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   903                                  ;
   904                                  ; NOTES:
   905                                  ;
   906                                  ;   Determine how much of iosys was loaded in when the loader was loaded
   907                                  ;   by the boot record (only the portion that is guaranteed to be contiguous)
   908                                  ;
   909                                  ; INPUT:
   910                                  ;   AX:Total cluster already read in (loader & bios)
   911                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster = number of clusters used for loader+2
   912                                  ;
   913                                  ; OUTPUT:
   914                                  ;	ES = 70h
   915                                  ;	DI = next offset to load iosys code
   916                                  ;	AX,BX,CX,DX,SI destroyed
   917                                  ;
   918                                  ;	CS:NextBioLocation = di on output
   919                                  ;	CS:last_cluster = last cluster loaded
   920                                  ;
   921                                  ; calls:     none
   922                                  ;
   923                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   924                                  ;
   925                                  ; Multiply cluster * cluster size in bytes to get total loaded for msload
   926                                  ;
   927                                  ; Subtract total_loaded - (EndOfLoader) to get loaded io.sys in last cluster
   928                                  ;
   929                                  ; Relocate this piece of iosys down to 70:0
   930                                  ;
   931                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   932                                  
   933                                  SaveLoadedBios:
   934 0000019B 1E                      		push	ds
   935                                  		; 24/12/2022
   936                                  		; ds = cs
   937                                  		; ax = number of loaded clusters
   938 0000019C F726[0400]              		mul	word [ClusterSize]
   939                                  		;mul	word [cs:ClusterSize]
   940                                  					; Get total bytes loaded by
   941                                  					; this is always < 64k, so
   942                                  					; lower 16 bits ok
   943                                  
   944 000001A0 2D[9003]                		sub	ax, EndOfLoader ; (OFFSET EndOfLoader)-(OFFSET Start)
   945 000001A3 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
   946 000001A5 B87000                  		mov	ax, 70h		; Segment at 70h
   947 000001A8 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
   948 000001AA 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
   949 000001AC BE[9003]                		mov	si, EndOfLoader ; EndOfLoader
   950 000001AF 31FF                    		xor	di, di

   952                                  		;mov	[NextBioLocation], di

   954

   956

   958                                  
   959                                  ; GetContigClusters
   960                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   961                                  ;
   962                                  ; NOTES: go find clusters as long as they are contiguous
   963                                  ;
   964                                  ;
   965                                  ; INPUT:
   966                                  ;   CS:NextBioLocation
   967                                  ;   CS:
   968                                  ;
   969                                  ; OUTPUT:
   970                                  ;
   971                                  ; calls: GetNextFatEntry
   972                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   973                                  ;
   974                                  ;Set CS:SectorCount to sectors per cluster
   975                                  ;
   976                                  ;Call GetNextFatEntry to get next cluster in file
   977                                  ;
   978                                  ;Call check_for_eof
   979                                  ;
   980                                  ;if (nc returned)
   981                                  ;
   982                                  ;   {call GetNextFatEntry
   983                                  ;
   984                                  ;    if (new cluster is contig to old cluster)
   985                                  ;	{add sectors per cluster to CS:SectorCount
   986                                  ;
   987                                  ;	 call check_for_eof
   988                                  ;
   989                                  ;	 if (nc returned)
   990                                  ;
   991                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   992                                  
   993                                  ; 09/12/2022
   994                                  ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
   995                                  ; DosLoadSeg equ 70h
   996                                  
   997                                  GetContigClusters:
   998                                  
   999                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1000                                  %if 0	
  1001                                  		xor	ah, ah
  1002                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1003                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1004                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1005                                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1006                                  		pop	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1007                                  		mov	word [cs:CurrentCluster], ax ; Update the last one found
  1008                                  		cmp	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; END_OF_FILE
  1009                                  		jz	short GoToBioInit
  1010                                  		xor	dx, dx
  1011                                  		;sub	ax, 2			; Zero base the cluster
  1012                                  		; 10/12/2022
  1013                                  		dec	ax
  1014                                  		dec	ax
  1015                                  		xor	ch, ch
  1016                                  		mov	cl, [cs:SecPerCluster]
  1017                                  		mul	cx			; How many sectors (before next cluster) 
  1018                                  		add	ax, [cs:FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts
  1019                                  		adc	dx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1020                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax	; Save it (used by ReadSectors)
  1021                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx
  1022                                  		mov	di, [cs:NextBioLocation] ; Get where to put code
  1023                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]	; Save how many sectors
  1024                                  		;mov	ax, DosLoadSeg
  1025                                  		mov	ax, 70h
  1026                                  		mov	es, ax
  1027                                  		call	ReadSectors
  1028                                  		pop	ax			; Get back total sectors read in
  1029                                  		mul	word [cs:BytesPerSec]	; Get number of bytes we loaded
  1030                                  		add	[cs:NextBioLocation], ax ; Point to where to load next	
  1031                                  		jmp	short GetContigClusters
  1032                                  
  1033                                  %endif
  1034                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1035                                  		; ds = cs
  1036                                  
  1037 000001B4 A1[1400]                		mov	ax, [SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1038 000001B7 A3[0E00]                		mov	[SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1039                                  		;push	word [SectorCount]
  1040 000001BA 50                      		push	ax
  1041 000001BB E8B900                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1042 000001BE 8F06[0E00]              		pop	word [SectorCount]
  1043 000001C2 A3[1000]                		mov	[CurrentCluster], ax	; Update the last one found
  1044

  1071                                  
  1072                                  ; GoToBiosInit
  1073                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1074                                  ;
  1075                                  ; NOTES:
  1076                                  ;
  1077                                  ;  Set up required registers for iosys, then jump to it (70:0)
  1078                                  ;
  1079                                  ; INPUT:     none
  1080                                  ;
  1081                                  ;   CS:MediaByte = media byte
  1082                                  ;   CS:BootDrive = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1083                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorL = first data sector on disk (low) (0-based)
  1084                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorH = first data sector on disk (high)
  1085                                  ;
  1086                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1087                                  ;
  1088                                  ;   required by msinit
  1089                                  ;   DL = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1090                                  ;   CH = media byte
  1091                                  ;   BX = first data sector on disk (0-based)
  1092                                  ;   AX = first data sector on disk (high)
  1093                                  ;   DI = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  1094                                  ;
  1095                                  ; calls:     none
  1096                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1097                                  ;
  1098                                  ; set up registers for msinit then do far jmp
  1099                                  ;
  1100                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1101                                  
  1102                                  GoToBioInit:	
  1103                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1104                                  		; ds = cs

  1106                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]

  1108                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1109

  1111 000001EA 8A16[2400]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive] ; Physical drv number we booted from.
  1112 000001EE 8B1E[2000]              		mov	bx, [FirstSectorL] ; AX:BX = first data sector of disk
  1113 000001F2 A1[2200]                		mov	ax, [FirstSectorH]
  1114                                  
  1115 000001F5 EA00007000              		jmp	70h:0	; Far jump to IoSysAddr	(DOSBIOS)
  1116                                  
  1117                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1118                                  
  1119                                  ; ReadSectors
  1120                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1121                                  ; notES:
  1122                                  ;
  1123                                  ;  read in the CS:SectorCount number of sectors at ES:di
  1124                                  ;
  1125                                  ;
  1126                                  ; INPUT:
  1127                                  ;
  1128                                  ;   DI = OFFSET of start of read
  1129                                  ;   ES = segment of read
  1130                                  ;   CS:SectorCount = number of sectors to read
  1131                                  ;   CS:StartSecL = starting sector (low)
  1132                                  ;   CS:StartSecH = starting sector (high)
  1133                                  ;   following is bpb info that must be setup prior to call
  1134                                  ;   CS:NumHeads
  1135                                  ;   CS:number_of_sectors
  1136                                  ;   CS:BootDrive
  1137                                  ;   CS:SecPerTrack
  1138                                  ;
  1139                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1140                                  ;
  1141                                  ;   AX,BX,CX,DX,SI,DI destroyed
  1142                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1143                                  ; divide start sector by sectors per track
  1144                                  ; the remainder is the actual sector number, 0 based
  1145                                  ;
  1146                                  ; increment actual sector number to get 1 based
  1147                                  ;
  1148                                  ; the quotient is the number of tracks - divide by heads to get the cyl
  1149                                  ;
  1150                                  ; the remainder is actual head, the quotient is cylinder
  1151                                  ;
  1152                                  ; figure the number of sectors in that track, set al to this
  1153                                  ;
  1154                                  ; do the read
  1155                                  ;
  1156                                  ; if error, do reset, then redo the int 13h
  1157                                  ;
  1158                                  ; if successful read, subtract # sectors read from SectorCount, add to logical
  1159                                  ; sector, add #sectors read * BytesPerSec to bx;
  1160                                  ;
  1161                                  ; if SectorCount <> 0 do next read
  1162                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1163                                  
  1164                                  ReadSectors:
  1165                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1166                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1167                                  ReadSectors:

  1224                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:BootDrive], 80h

  1226                                  dma_boundary_chk:
  1227                                  		cmp	si, 1

  1229                                  				; 1 sector read will not cause a boundary error			
  1230                                  		push	dx

  1273                                  			; ax <= 1024, dx <= 255
  1274                                  
  1275 00000237 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl

  1279 0000023D 08DC                    		or	ah, bl			; Mix in with sector bits

  1383                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1384                                  
  1385                                  ; GetNextFatEntry
  1386                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1387                                  ;
  1388                                  ; NOTES:
  1389                                  ;
  1390                                  ;   given the last cluster found, this will return the next cluster of
  1391                                  ;   iosys. if the last cluster is (f)ff8 - (f)fff, then the final cluster
  1392                                  ;   of iosys has been loaded, and control is passed to goto_iosys
  1393                                  ;   msload can handle maximum fat area size of 128 kb.
  1394                                  ;
  1395                                  ; INPUT:
  1396                                  ;
  1397                                  ;    CS:CurrentCluster
  1398                                  ;    CS:FatSize
  1399                                  ;
  1400                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1401                                  ;
  1402                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster (updated)
  1403                                  ;
  1404                                  ; calls:  GetFatSector
  1405                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1406                                  ; get CurrentCluster
  1407                                  ;
  1408                                  ; if (16 bit fat)
  1409                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = fff8 - ffff)
  1410                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1411                                  ;     else
  1412                                  ;	{get OFFSET by multiply cluster by 2}
  1413                                  ;
  1414                                  ; else
  1415                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = ff8 - fff)
  1416                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1417                                  ;     else
  1418                                  ;	{get OFFSET by	- multiply cluster by 3
  1419                                  ;
  1420                                  ;	 rotate right to divide by 2
  1421                                  ;
  1422                                  ;	 if (cy set - means odd number)
  1423                                  ;	    {shr 4 times to keep high twelve bits}
  1424                                  ;
  1425                                  ;	 else
  1426                                  ;	    {and with 0fffh to keep low 12 bits}
  1427                                  ;	}
  1428                                  ;    }
  1429                                  ;
  1430                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1431                                  
  1432                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1433                                  ; FAT_12_BIT equ 1
  1434                                  ; NOT_END_OF_FILE equ 0  ; ~END_OF_FILE ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1435                                  
  1436                                  GetNextFatEntry:
  1437 00000277 06                      		push	es
  1438                                  		; 24/12/2022

  1443                                  		; 09/12/2022
  1444                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], END_OF_FILE
  1445                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1446                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster

  1451 00000285 803E[2500]01            		cmp	byte [Fatsize], 1
  1452                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:FatSize], FAT_12_BIT
  1453                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:Fatsize], 1

  1462 00000294 E84700                  		call	GetFatSector
  1463                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1464                                  		;pop	dx
  1465 00000297 7510                    		jnz	short ClusterOk
  1466 00000299 268A07                  		mov	al, [es:bx]

  1468                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster], al

  1471                                  		; 23/12/2022

  1536                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1537                                  
  1538                                  ; GetFatSector
  1539                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1540                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ES:0
  1541                                  ;
  1542                                  ;in). SI = offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find.
  1543                                  ;     ES = fat sector segment
  1544                                  ;     CS:BytesPerSec
  1545                                  ;
  1546                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  1547                                  ;      BX = offset value of the corresponding fat entry in the fat sector.
  1548                                  ;      CX destroyed.
  1549                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e. when 12 bit fat entry
  1550                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  1551                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  1552                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat).
  1553                                  ;
  1554                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1555                                  
  1556                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1557                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1558                                  GetFatSector:
  1559 000002DE 50                      		push	ax
  1560 000002DF 56                      		push	si
  1561 000002E0 57                      		push	di
  1562 000002E1 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  1563                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1564                                  		; ds = cs
  1565                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1566                                  		;div	cx			; AX = Sector number, DX = Offset
  1567 000002E3 F736[1200]              		div	word [BytesPerSec]
  1568 000002E7 3B06[0C00]              		cmp	ax, [LastFatSector]
  1569                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:LastFatSector]	; The same fat sector?
  1570 000002EB 7421                    		je	short SplitChk		; Don't need to read it again.
  1571 000002ED A3[0C00]                		mov	[LastFatSector], ax
  1572                                  		;mov	[cs:LastFatSector], ax
  1573 000002F0 52                      		push	dx
  1574                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1575 000002F1 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1576                                  		;add	ax, [cs:HiddenSectorsL]
  1577                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:HiddenSectorsH]
  1578                                  		;add	ax, [cs:ReservSectors]
  1579                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1580                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1581                                  		; ds = cs
  1582 000002F3 0306[2C00]              		add	ax, [FatStartSecL]
  1583 000002F7 1316[2E00]              		adc	dx, [FatStartSecH]
  1584 000002FB A3[0600]                		mov	[StartSecL], ax
  1585 000002FE 8916[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], dx		; Set up for ReadSectors
  1586                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax
  1587                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx	; Set up for ReadSectors
  1588                                  		
  1589 00000302 C706[0E00]0100          		mov	word [SectorCount], 1 ; 1 sector			
  1590                                  		;mov	word [cs:SectorCount], 1 ; 1 sector
  1591 00000308 31FF                    		xor	di, di ; 0
  1592                                  		; es:di = FATSEGMENT:0000h
  1593 0000030A E8EDFE                  		call	ReadSectors
  1594 0000030D 5A                      		pop	dx
  1595                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1596                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1597                                  SplitChk:
  1598                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1599 0000030E 8B0E[1200]              		mov	cx, [BytesPerSec]				
  1600 00000312 49                      		dec	cx			; CX = SECTOR SIZE - 1
  1601 00000313 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx			; If last byte of sector, splitted entry.
  1602 00000315 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx			; set bx to dx
  1603 00000317 5F                      		pop	di
  1604 00000318 5E                      		pop	si
  1605 00000319 58                      		pop	ax
  1606                                  EndWrite:		; 10/12/2022
  1607 0000031A C3                      		retn
  1608                                  
  1609                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1610

  1612                                  		; 24/12/2022

  1617 0000031B BE[4203]                		mov	si, NonSystemDiskMsg ; "\r\nNon-System disk or disk error\r\nRe"...

  1619                                  
  1620                                  		; Wait for a keypress on the keyboard.
  1621                                  		; Use the bios keyboard interrupt.
  1622                                  
  1623 00000321 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  1624 00000323 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  1625                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  1626                                  
  1627                                  		; We have to restore the address of the original rom disk
  1628                                  		; parameter table to the location at [0:DskAddr]. The address
  1629                                  		; of this original table has been saved previously in
  1630                                  		; 0:OrgDasdPtr and 0:OrgDasdPtr+2. After this table address
  1631                                  		; has been restored we can reboot by invoking the bootstrap
  1632                                  		; loader bios interrupt.
  1633                                  
  1634                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1635                                  		;xor	bx, bx
  1636                                  		;mov	ds, bx
  1637                                  		;les	bx, [OrgDasdPtr] ; Wrong DS segment !
  1638                                  					 ; (Erdogan Tan, 23/12/2022)
  1639 00000325 C41E[2800]              		les	bx, [OrgDasdPtr] ; Correct DS segment = CS
  1640                                  		
  1641                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1642 00000329 16                      		push	ss ; 0
  1643 0000032A 1F                      		pop	ds
  1644                                  		; ds = 0		
  1645                                  
  1646 0000032B BE7800                  		mov	si, DskAddr	; (Int 1Eh)
  1647 0000032E 891C                    		mov	[si], bx	; restore offset		
  1648 00000330 8C4402                  		mov	[si+2], es	; restore segment
  1649 00000333 CD19                    		int	19h		; reboot
  1650                                  
  1651                                  
  1652                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1653                                  
  1654                                  ; WriteTTY
  1655                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1656                                  ; in) DS:si -> asciiz string.
  1657                                  ;
  1658                                  ; WriteTTY the character in al to the screen.
  1659                                  ; use video service 'write teletype to active page' (ROM_TTY)
  1660                                  ; use normal character attribute
  1661                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1662                                  
  1663                                  WriteTTY:
  1664 00000335 AC                      		lodsb
  1665 00000336 08C0                    		or	al, al
  1666 00000338 74E0                    		jz	short EndWrite
  1667                                  		;mov	AH, ROM_TTY	; 09/12/2022
  1668 0000033A B40E                    		mov	ah, 0Eh
  1669 0000033C B307                    		mov	bl, 7		; "normal" attribute
  1670 0000033E CD10                    		int	10h		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTER AND	ADVANCE	CURSOR (TTY WRITE)
  1671                                  					; AL = character, BH = display page (alpha modes)
  1672                                  					; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)
  1673 00000340 EBF3                    		jmp	short WriteTTY
  1674                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1675                                  
  1676                                  ; 10/12/2022	
  1677                                  ;EndWrite:
  1678                                  ;		retn

  1704                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

  1718 00000003 0000                    DosDataSg:	dw 0
  1719                                  
  1720                                  ; DOS's int 2f handler will exit via a jump through here.
  1721                                  ; This is how the BIOS hooks int2f

  1726                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  1727                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIODATA:0006h
  1728                                  		;dw int_2f

  1736                                  					; This is to maintain binary compatibility

  1739                                  ; This is a byte used for special key handling in the resident
  1740                                  ; console device driver. It must be here so that it can be included

  1889 00000119 [4E03]                  start_bds:	dw bds1			; Start	of linked list of BDS's
  1890 0000011B 7000                    		dw 70h			; KERNEL_SEGMENT
  1891                                  
  1892                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  1893                                  ; Some floppy drives do not have changeline support. The result is a
  1894                                  ; large amount of inefficiency in the code. A media-check always returns
  1895                                  ; "I don`t know". This cause DOS to reread the FAT on every access and
  1896                                  ; always discard any cached data.
  1897                                  ;    We get around this inefficiency by implementing a "Logical Door Latch".
  1898                                  ; The following three items are used to do this. The logical door latch is
  1899                                  ; based on the premise that it is not physically possible to change floppy
  1900                                  ; disks in a drive in under two seconds (most people take about 10). The
  1901                                  ; logical door latch is implemented by saving the time of the last successful
  1902                                  ; disk operation (in the value TIM_DRV). When a new request is made the
  1903                                  ; current time is compared to the saved time. If less than two seconds have
  1904                                  ; passed then the value "No Change" is returned. If more than two seconds
  1905                                  ; have passed the value "Don't Know" is returned.
  1906                                  ;    There is one complecation to this algorithm. Some programs change the
  1907                                  ; value of the timer. In this unfortunate case we have an invalid timer.
  1908                                  ; This possibility is detected by counting the number of disk operations
  1909                                  ; which occur without any time passing. If this count exceeds the value of
  1910                                  ; "AccessMax" we assume the counter is invalid and always return "Don't
  1911                                  ; Know". The variable "AccessCount" is used to keep track of the number
  1912                                  ; of disk operation which occur without the time changing.
  1913                                  
  1914 0000011D 00                      accesscount:	db 0			
  1915 0000011E FF                      tim_drv:	db 0FFh			
  1916 0000011F 00                      medbyt:		db 0
  1917                                  wrtverify:	; 15/10/2022			
  1918 00000120 02                      rflag:		db 2			; 2 for	read, 3	for write
  1919 00000121 00                      verify:		db 0			; 1 if verify after write
  1920 00000122 0000                    seccnt:		dw 0			
  1921 00000124 00                      		db 0			; -- pad where hardnum was
  1922 00000125 01                      dsktnum:	db 1			; number of diskette drives			
  1923                                  
  1924                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  1925                                  ; Some of the older versions of the IBM rom-bios always assumed a seek would
  1926                                  ; have to be made to read the diskette. Consequently a large head settle
  1927                                  ; time was always used in the I/O operations. To get around this problem
  1928                                  ; we need to continually adjust the head settle time. The following
  1929                                  ; algorithm is used:
  1930                                  ;
  1931                                  ;   Get the current head settle value.
  1932                                  ;   If it is 1, then
  1933                                  ;	set slow = 15
  1934                                  ;   else
  1935                                  ;	set slow = value
  1936                                  ;   ...
  1937                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing then
  1938                                  ;	use slow
  1939                                  ;   else
  1940                                  ;	use fast
  1941                                  ;   ...
  1942                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  1943                                  
  1944 00000126 00                      motorstartup:	db 0			; value from table
  1945 00000127 00                      settlecurrent:	db 0			; value	from table
  1946 00000128 00                      settleslow:	db 0			; slow settle value
  1947 00000129 00                      nextspeed:	db 0			; value	of speed to be used
  1948 0000012A 00                      save_head_sttl:	db 0			; used by read_sector routine
  1949 0000012B 00                      save_eot:	db 0			; saved	eot from the default DPT
  1950 0000012C 09                      eot:		db 9			
  1951 0000012D 00000000                dpt:		dd 0			; pointer to Disk Parameter Table			
  1952 00000131 00                      cursec:		db 0			; current sector
  1953 00000132 00                      curhd:		db 0			; current head
  1954 00000133 0000                    curtrk:		dw 0			; current track
  1955 00000135 0000                    spsav:		dw 0			; save the stack pointer
  1956 00000137 08                      formt_eot:	db 8			; eot used for format
  1957 00000138 00                      hdnum:		db 0			; head number
  1958 00000139 0000                    trknum:		dw 0			; track	being manipulated
  1959 0000013B 50                      gap_patch:	db 50h			; format gap patched into dpt
  1960                                  
  1961                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1962

  1964

  1995                                  ; in them which causes the byte after the buffer to be trashed
  1996                                  ; on floppy reads to odd-byte boundaries. Although no general effort 
  1997                                  ; is made to enforce this in the bigger picture, this one small sacrifice
  1998                                  ; makes that system more-or-less work.

  2389                                  ;************************************************************************
  2390                                  ;*									*
  2391                                  ;*	strategy - store es:bx (device driver request packet)		*
  2392                                  ;*		     away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call	*
  2393                                  ;*									*
  2394                                  ;************************************************************************
  2395                                  
  2396                                  strategy:	; proc far		
  2397 000006D0 2E891E[1200]            		mov	[cs:ptrsav], bx ; store es:bx (device driver request packet)
  2398                                  					; away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call
  2399 000006D5 2E8C06[1400]            		mov	[cs:ptrsav+2], es
  2400 000006DA CB                      		retf

  2403                                  
  2404                                  ;************************************************************************
  2405                                  ;*									*
  2406                                  ;*	device driver entry points. these are the initial		*
  2407                                  ;*	  'interrupt' hooks out of the device driver chain.		*
  2408                                  ;*	  in the case of our resident drivers, they'll just		*
  2409                                  ;*	  stick a fake return address on the stack which		*
  2410                                  ;*	  points to dispatch tables and possibly some unit		*
  2411                                  ;*	  numbers, and then call through a common entry point		*
  2412                                  ;*	  which can take care of a20 switching				*
  2413                                  ;*									*
  2414                                  ;************************************************************************
  2415                                  
  2416                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan
  2417                                  ; (disassembled MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS code here with fixed table
  2418                                  ;  addresses, they will be changed to table labels later)
  2419                                  
  2420                                  ; 09/12/2022
  2421                                  
  2422                                  con_entry:				
  2423 000006DB E84000                  		call	cdev_entry
  2424                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2425                                  		;dw 0E4h		; con_table
  2426 000006DE [E700]                  		dw con_table

  2429

  2433                                  		;dw 0FBh		; prn_table

  2435                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  2436 000006E5 0000                    		db 0, 0
  2437                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2438                                  
  2439                                  prn1_entry:

  2441                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2442                                  		;dw 0FBh		; prn_table

  2444                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  2445 000006EC 0001                    		db 0, 1
  2446                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2447                                  
  2448                                  prn2_entry:				
  2449 000006EE E82D00                  		call	cdev_entry
  2450                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2451                                  		;dw 0FBh		; prn_table
  2452 000006F1 [FE00]                  		dw prn_table
  2453                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  2454 000006F3 0102                    		db 1, 2
