 10895                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10896                                  
 10897                                  ; 15/10/52022
 10898                                  
 10899                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10900                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10901                                  ;
 10902                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10903                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10904                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10905                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10906                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10907                                  ;	ds = cs
 10908                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10909                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10910                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10911                                  ;
 10912                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10913                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10914                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10915                                  
 10916                                  diskrd:	
 10917                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 10918                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10919 00000963 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 10920                                  
 10921                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10922                                  
 10923                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10924                                  diskio:
 10925 00000968 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 10926 0000096A 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 10927 0000096E E8FFFB                  		call	SetDrive
 10928 00000971 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 10929 00000975 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 10930                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 10931 00000978 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 10932                                  
 10933                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 10934                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 10935                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 10936                                  
 10937 0000097A 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 10938                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 10939                                  					; unformatted_media
 10940 0000097F 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 10941 00000981 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 10942 00000985 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 10943                                  
 10944                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 10945                                  
 10946 00000989 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10947 0000098B 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 10948 0000098D 01CA                    		add	dx, cx
 10949 0000098F 83D600                  		adc	si, 0
 10950 00000992 26837D0E00              		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10951                                  					; > 32 bit sector ?
 10952 00000997 740D                    		jz	short sanity32
 10953 00000999 83FE00                  		cmp	si, 0
 10954 0000099C 75BD                    		jnz	short baddrive
 10955 0000099E 263B550E                		cmp	dx, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10956 000009A2 77B7                    		ja	short baddrive
 10957 000009A4 EB12                    		jmp	short sanityok
 10958                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10959                                  
 10960                                  sanity32:				
 10961 000009A6 0336[2305]              		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 10962 000009AA 263B751D                		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 10963 000009AE 7208                    		jb	short sanityok
 10964 000009B0 77A9                    		ja	short baddrive
 10965 000009B2 263B551B                		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 10966 000009B6 77A3                    		ja	short baddrive
 10967                                  
 10968                                  sanityok:				
 10969 000009B8 8B16[2305]              		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 10970 000009BC 26034517                		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 10971 000009C0 26135519                		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 10972                                  
 10973                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 10974                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 10975                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 10976                                  
 10977 000009C4 A3[2505]                		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 10978                                  
 10979                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 10980                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 10981                                  
 10982 000009C7 06                      		push	es
 10983 000009C8 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10984 000009CC 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 10985                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 10986                                  					; current disk parm table
 10987 000009D1 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 10988 000009D5 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es
 10989 000009D9 07                      		pop	es
 10990 000009DA 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10991                                  					; fnon_removable
 10992 000009DF 7510                    		jnz	short skip_setup
 10993 000009E1 E8F6FE                  		call	checksingle
 10994                                  
 10995                                  ; check to see if we have previously noted a change line. the routine
 10996                                  ; returns if everything is ok. otherwise, it pops off the stack and returns
 10997                                  ; the proper error code.
 10998                                  
 10999 000009E4 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 11000 000009E9 7403                    		jz	short diskio_nochangeline ; brif not
 11001 000009EB E8B80E                  		call	checklatchio	; will do a sneaky pop stack return
 11002                                  					; if a disk error occurs
 11003                                  diskio_nochangeline:			
 11004 000009EE E84700                  		call	iosetup		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11005                                  
 11006                                  ; now the settle values are correct for the following code
 11007                                  
 11008                                  skip_setup:
 11009                                  
 11010                                  ; 32 bit sector calculation.
 11011                                  ; dx:[saved_word] = starting sector number.
 11012                                  				
 11013 000009F1 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11014 000009F3 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 11015 000009F5 26F77513                		div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11016                                  					 ; divide by sec per track
 11017 000009F9 A3[2105]                		mov	[temp_h], ax
 11018 000009FC A1[2505]                		mov	ax, [saved_word]
 11019 000009FF 26F77513                		div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11020                                  					; now, [temp_h]:ax = track #, dx = sector
 11021                                  		;inc	dl		; sector number	is 1 based.
 11022                                  		; 18/12/2022
 11023 00000A03 42                      		inc	dx
 11024 00000A04 8816[3101]              		mov	[cursec], dl	; save current sector
 11025 00000A08 268B4D15                		mov	cx, [es:di+15h]	; es:di+BDS.heads]
 11026                                  					; get number of	heads
 11027 00000A0C 50                      		push	ax
 11028 00000A0D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 11029 00000A0F A1[2105]                		mov	ax, [temp_h]	; divide tracks	by heads per cylinder
 11030 00000A12 F7F1                    		div	cx
 11031 00000A14 A3[2105]                		mov	[temp_h], ax
 11032 00000A17 58                      		pop	ax
 11033 00000A18 F7F1                    		div	cx		; now, [temp_h]:ax = cylinder #, dx = head
 11034 00000A1A 833E[2105]00            		cmp	word [temp_h], 0
 11035 00000A1F 7714                    		ja	short baddrive_brdg
 11036 00000A21 3D0004                  		cmp	ax, 1024	; 2^10 currently maxium	for track #.
 11037 00000A24 770F                    		ja	short baddrive_brdg
 11038 00000A26 8816[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dl	; save current head
 11039 00000A2A A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax	; save current track
 11040                                  
 11041                                  ; we are now set up for the i/o. normally, we consider the dma boundary
 11042                                  ; violations here. not true. we perform the operation as if everything is
 11043                                  ; symmetric; let the int 13 handler worry about the dma violations.
 11044                                  
 11045 00000A2D A1[2201]                		mov	ax, [seccnt]
 11046 00000A30 E88400                  		call	block		; (cas - call/ret)
 11047                                  		;call	done
 11048                                  		;retn
 11049                                  		; 18/12/2022
 11050 00000A33 EB4B                    		jmp	done
 11051                                  
 11052                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11053                                  
 11054                                  baddrive_brdg:				
 11055 00000A35 E923FF                  		jmp	baddrive
 11056                                  
 11057                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11058                                  
 11059                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11060                                  ; set the drive-last-accessed flag for diskette only. 
 11061                                  ; we know that the hard disk will not be removed.
 11062                                  ; es:di -> current bds.
 11063                                  ; ds -> Bios_Data
 11064                                  ; ax,cx,si are destroyed.
 11065                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11066                                  
 11067                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11068                                  iosetup:	
 11069 00000A38 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11070 00000A3C A2[1E01]                		mov	[tim_drv], al	; save drive letter
 11071                                  
 11072                                  ; determine proper head settle values
 11073                                  
 11074 00000A3F 803E[3006]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11075 00000A44 7539                    		jnz	short skip_dpt_setting

 11519                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11520                                  
 11521                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11522                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11523                                  
 11524                                  set_tim:

 11526 00000C88 E894F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11527                                  
 11528                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11529                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11530

 11534                                  		;jz	short done_set

 11537                                  setaccess:

 11540 00000CA0 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11541                                  done_set:

 11543                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11544 00000CA5 58                      		pop	ax
 11545 00000CA6 C3                      		retn

 11547                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11548                                  
 11549                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11550                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11551                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11552                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11553                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11554                                  
 11555                                  again:	
 11556 00000CA7 E87004                  		call	ResetDisk
 11557 00000CAA 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11558 00000CAD 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11559                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11560 00000CAF 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11561 00000CB0 C3                      		retn
 11562                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11563                                  
 11564                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11565 00000CB1 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11566 00000CB3 C3                      		retn

 11672                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11673                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11674                                  ;
 11675                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11676                                  ;
 11677                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11678                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11679                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11680                                  ;
 11681                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11682                                  
 11683                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11684                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11685                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11686 00000CE4 E889F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11687 00000CE7 06                      		push	es
 11688 00000CE8 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11689 00000CEC 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11690                                  					; RAWIO
 11691 00000CF1 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11692 00000CF5 07                      		pop	es
 11693 00000CF6 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11694                                  
 11695                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11696                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11697                                  
 11698                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11699 00000CF8 BE[B50C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11700                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11701                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11702 00000CFB A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11703 00000CFD 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11704                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11705 00000CFF BE[C80C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11706                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11707                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11708                                  NotGenericWrite:

 11721                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11722 00000D19 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11723 00000D1B C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code

 11738                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:

 11740                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11741                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)

 11743                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11744                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header

 11752

 11958                                  
 11959                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11960                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11961                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11962                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11963                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11964                                  ;
 11965                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11966                                  ;
 11967                                  ; output:
 11968                                  ;	for status call:
 11969                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11970                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11971                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11972                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11973                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11974                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11975                                  ;
 11976                                  ;	for format track:
 11977                                  ;		carry set if error
 11978                                  ;
 11979                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11980                                  
 11981                                  ; 16/03/2019

 12130                                  
 12131                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12132                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12133                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12134                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12135                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12136                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12137                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 12138                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 12139                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay

 12141                                  		; register.

 12243                                  
 12244                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12245                                  
 12246                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12247                                  
 12248                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12249                                  ;
 12250                                  ; TrackIo:
 12251                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12252                                  ;
 12253                                  ;   input:
 12254                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12255                                  ;		  3 = write
 12256                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12257                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12258                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12259                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12260                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12261                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12262                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12263                                  ;
 12264                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12265                                  
 12266                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12267                                  		
 12268                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12269                                  TrackIo:	
 12270                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12271 00000F8F 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12272 00000F93 E844F9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12273 00000F96 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12274                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12275 00000F9B 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12276 00000F9D 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12277 00000F9E 51                      		push	cx
 12278 00000F9F E896FA                  		call	iosetup
 12279 00000FA2 59                      		pop	cx
 12280 00000FA3 58                      		pop	ax
 12281                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 12282 00000FA4 BE[3305]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 12283 00000FA7 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12284 00000FA9 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12285 00000FAB 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12286                                  
 12287                                  		; WE WANT:
 12288                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12289                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12290                                  		
 12291 00000FAD BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12292                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12293 00000FB0 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 12294                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12295                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12296 00000FB5 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 12297                                  		
 12298 00000FB7 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 12299                                  ionextsector:				
 12300 00000FB9 51                      		push	cx
 12301 00000FBA 52                      		push	dx
 12302 00000FBB 46                      		inc	si
 12303 00000FBC 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 12304                                  					; the track table
 12305 00000FBD AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 12306 00000FBE A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 12307                                  
 12308                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12309                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12310                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12311                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12312                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 12313                                  		
 12314                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12315 00000FC1 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12316                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12317                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 12318 00000FC6 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 12319                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12320 00000FC8 F606[2705]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 12321                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 12322                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12323 00000FCD 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12324 00000FCF 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12325 00000FD3 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12326 00000FD5 E81DFB                  		call	Disk
 12327 00000FD8 5A                      		pop	dx
 12328 00000FD9 59                      		pop	cx
 12329 00000FDA F8                      		clc
 12330 00000FDB C3                      		retn
 12331                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12332                                  
 12333                                  IoRemovable:				
 12334 00000FDC AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 12335                                  					; table	and save it
 12336 00000FDD 50                      		push	ax
 12337 00000FDE 56                      		push	si
 12338 00000FDF 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 12339 00000FE0 50                      		push	ax
 12340 00000FE1 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 12341                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 12342 00000FE5 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 12343 00000FE9 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 12344 00000FEC 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12345 00000FEF 58                      		pop	ax
 12346 00000FF0 1F                      		pop	ds
 12347 00000FF1 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12348 00000FF3 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 12349 00000FF6 E8FCFA                  		call	Disk
 12350 00000FF9 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 12351                                  					; sector size
 12352 00000FFA 58                      		pop	ax
 12353 00000FFB E81D00                  		call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 12354 00000FFE 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 12355 00001000 5A                      		pop	dx
 12356 00001001 59                      		pop	cx
 12357 00001002 E2B5                    		loop	ionextsector
 12358 00001004 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12359                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 12360                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12361 00001009 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 12362 0000100B E872FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 12363                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 12364                                  NoNeedDone:				
 12365 0000100E F8                      		clc
 12366                                  NoNeedDone2:
 12367 0000100F C3                      		retn
 12368                                  
 12369                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12370                                  
 12371                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12372                                  ;
 12373                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12374                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12375                                  ; are permissible.
 12376                                  ;
 12377                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12378                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12379                                  ; All other registers preserved
 12380                                  ;
 12381                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12382                                  
 12383                                  SectSizeToSectIndex:	
 12384 00001010 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 12385                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 12386 00001013 7703                    		ja	short OneK
 12387 00001015 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 12388 00001017 C3                      		retn
 12389                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12390                                  
 12391                                  OneK:					
 12392 00001018 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12393 0000101A C3                      		retn
 12394                                  
 12395                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12396                                  
 12397                                  
 12398                                  SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize:
 12399 0000101B 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 12400 0000101D B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 12401 00001020 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 12402 00001022 C3                      		retn
 12403                                  
 12404                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12405                                  
 12406                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12407                                  
 12408                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12409                                  ;
 12410                                  ; SetDASD
 12411                                  ;
 12412                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12413                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12414                                  ;
 12415                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12416                                  ;
 12417                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12418                                  
 12419                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12420                                  SetDasd:	
 12421 00001023 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12422                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12423 00001028 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12424                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12425 0000102A 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12426                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12427                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12428 0000102F 744A                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12429                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12430 00001031 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 12431                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12432                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12433                                  DoSetDasd:				
 12434 00001036 C606[3106]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12435 0000103B C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12436 00001040 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12437 00001042 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12438                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 12439 00001047 741A                    		jz	short DoSet
 12440 00001049 26807D2201              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12441                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12442 0000104E 7404                    		jz	short GotBig
 12443 00001050 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 12444 00001052 EB0F                    		jmp	short DoSet
 12445                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12446                                  
 12447                                  GotBig:					
 12448 00001054 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12449 00001056 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12450 0000105B 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12451                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12452                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12453                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 12454                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12455 0000105D 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 12456 0000105E C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 12457                                  DoSet:					
 12458 00001063 1E                      		push	ds
 12459 00001064 56                      		push	si
 12460 00001065 8E1E[1A00]              		mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 12461                                  
 12462 00001069 C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 12463                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 12464                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h		
 12465                                  
 12466 0000106D C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 12467                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12468 00001071 5E                      		pop	si
 12469 00001072 1F                      		pop	ds
 12470 00001073 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 12471 00001075 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12472 00001079 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12473                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12474                                  DasdHasBeenSet:				
 12475 0000107B 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12476 0000107F 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 12477 00001083 C3                      		retn
 12478                                  
 12479                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12480                                  
 12481                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12482                                  
 12483                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12484                                  ;
 12485                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12486                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12487                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12488                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12489                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12490                                  ;
 12491                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12492                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12493                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12494                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12495                                  ;
 12496                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12497                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12498                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12499                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12500                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12501                                  ;
 12502                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12503                                  
 12504                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12505                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12506 00001084 51                      		push	cx
 12507 00001085 52                      		push	dx
 12508                                  
 12509                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12510                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12511                                  
 12512 00001086 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12513 0000108B 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12514 0000108D 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12515 0000108F 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12516 00001094 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12517 00001096 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12518                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12519                                  
 12520                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12521 00001098 06                      		push	es
 12522 00001099 56                      		push	si
 12523 0000109A 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12524 0000109E 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12525                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12526                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12527 000010A3 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12528 000010A7 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12529                                  
 12530                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12531                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12532                                  
 12533 000010AB 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12534 000010B0 5E                      		pop	si
 12535 000010B1 07                      		pop	es
 12536                                  
 12537                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 12538 000010B2 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12539 000010B6 49                      		dec	cx
 12540 000010B7 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12541 000010BA D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12542 000010BC D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12543 000010BE 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12544 000010C0 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12545 000010C4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12546 000010C8 06                      		push	es
 12547 000010C9 1E                      		push	ds
 12548 000010CA 56                      		push	si
 12549 000010CB 57                      		push	di
 12550 000010CC B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12551 000010CE CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12552                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12553 000010D0 7233                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12554 000010D2 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12555 000010D7 7425                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12556 000010D9 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12557 000010DA 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12558 000010DE 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12559                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12560                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12561 000010E3 8936[3206]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12562 000010E7 8C06[3406]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12563 000010EB 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12564                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12565 000010EF 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12566                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12567 000010F4 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12568 000010F9 C606[3006]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12569                                  skip_disk_base_setting:			
 12570 000010FE 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12571                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12572 00001100 A2[3106]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12573 00001103 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 12574                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12575                                  
 12576                                  FormaStatErr:
 12577                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12578 00001105 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12579                                  				
 12580 00001107 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 12581                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12582 0000110A 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12583 0000110C 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 12584 0000110F 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 12585                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12586                                  		;dec	al
 12587                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12588 00001111 48                      		dec	ax
 12589                                  		; al = 2
 12590                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 12591                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12592                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12593                                  
 12594                                  FormatStatIllegalComb:
 12595                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12596                                  		;dec	al	; 3 -> 2 or 2 -> 1
 12597                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12598 00001112 48                      		dec	ax
 12599                                  		; al = 2				
 12600                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12601                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12602                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12603                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12604                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12605                                  
 12606                                  FormatStatTimeOut:			
 12607                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12608                                  		; al = 3
 12609                                  		;mov	al, 3		; Function supported, but
 12610                                  					; Media	not present.
 12611                                  PopStatRet:				
 12612 00001113 5F                      		pop	di
 12613 00001114 5E                      		pop	si
 12614 00001115 1F                      		pop	ds
 12615 00001116 07                      		pop	es
 12616                                  SetMediaRet:				
 12617 00001117 5A                      		pop	dx
 12618 00001118 59                      		pop	cx
 12619 00001119 C3                      		retn
 12620                                  
 12621                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12622                                  
 12623                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12624                                  
 12625                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12626                                  ;
 12627                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12628                                  ;
 12629                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12630                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12631                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12632                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12633                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12634                                  ;
 12635                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12636                                  
 12637                                  ResetDisk:	
 12638 0000111A 50                      		push	ax
 12639 0000111B 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12640                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12641 00001120 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12642                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12643 00001122 C606[3106]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12644                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12645 00001127 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12646 00001129 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12647                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12648 0000112B C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12649                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12650 00001130 58                      		pop	ax
 12651 00001131 C3                      		retn
 12652                                  
 12653                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12654                                  
 12655                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12656                                  
 12657                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12658                                  ;
 12659                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12660                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12661                                  ;
 12662                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12663                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12664                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12665                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12666                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12667                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12668                                  ;
 12669                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12670                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12671                                  ;
 12672                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12673                                  
 12674                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12675                                  ToRom:	
 12676 00001132 53                      		push	bx
 12677 00001133 56                      		push	si
 12678                                  
 12679                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12680                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12681                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12682                                  
 12683 00001134 F606[3006]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12684 00001139 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12685 0000113B 50                      		push	ax
 12686 0000113C 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12687 0000113D 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12688                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12689 00001142 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12690 00001143 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12691                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12692 00001147 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12693                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12694                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12695 0000114C 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12696 00001150 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12697                                  		
 12698 00001154 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12699 00001157 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12700 0000115B A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12701 0000115E 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12702                                  					; Important for	format
 12703 00001162 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12704                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12705                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12706 00001167 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12707 00001168 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12708 0000116A 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12709                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12710 0000116F 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12711 00001170 58                      		pop	ax
 12712                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12713 00001171 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12714 00001175 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12715 00001177 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12716 0000117B 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12717 0000117F 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12718 00001180 8E06[2F05]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12719 00001184 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12720 00001186 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12721 00001187 5E                      		pop	si
 12722 00001188 5B                      		pop	bx
 12723 00001189 C3                      		retn
 12724                                  
 12725                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12726                                  
 12727                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12728                                  
 12729                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12730                                  
 12731                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12732                                  ;
 12733                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12734                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12735                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12736                                  ;
 12737                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12738                                  
 12739                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12740                                  ioctl_getown:
 12741 0000118A E8E3F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12742 0000118D 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12743                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12744 00001191 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12745                                  ownloop:				
 12746 00001195 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12747 00001199 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12748                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12749 0000119B 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12750                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12751                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12752 000011A0 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12753                                  getnextBDS:				
 12754 000011A2 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12755 000011A5 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12756                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12757                                  
 12758                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12759                                  ;
 12760                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12761                                  ; in al to al.
 12762                                  ;
 12763                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12764                                  
 12765                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12766                                  ioctl_setown:
 12767 000011A7 E8C6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12768 000011AA C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12769                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12770 000011AF E828F7                  		call	checksingle
 12771 000011B2 C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12772                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12773                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12774                                  
 12775                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12776                                  ;
 12777                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12778                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12779                                  ;
 12780                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12781                                  
 12782                                  exitown:				
 12783 000011B7 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12784                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12785 000011B9 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12786                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12787                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12788 000011BE 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12789 000011C0 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12790                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12791                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12792 000011C4 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12793                                  exitnomult:				
 12794 000011C6 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]

 12796                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12797                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12798                                  		; cf=0
 12799                                  		;clc
