 12853                                  
 12854                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12855                                  ;	get media id
 12856                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12857                                  ;
 12858                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12859                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12860                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12861                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12862                                  ;
 12863                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12864                                  ;
 12865                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12866                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12867                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12868                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12869                                  ;
 12870                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12871                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12872                                  ;
 12873                                  ; LOGIC:
 12874                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12875                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12876                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12877                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12878                                  ;
 12879                                  ; {
 12880                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12881                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12882                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12883                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12884                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12885                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12886                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12887                                  ;		};
 12888                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12889                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12890                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12891                                  ;		};
 12892                                  ;	else
 12893                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12894                                  ;
 12895                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12896                                  
 12897                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12898                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12899                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12900                                  
 12901                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12902                                  GetMediaId:
 12903 000011FC E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12904 000011FF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12905 00001203 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12906 00001208 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12907 0000120B 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12908                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12909 0000120D 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12910                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12911 00001212 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12912                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12913 00001214 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12914 00001217 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12915                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12916                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12917 0000121A 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12918 0000121C C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12919 00001220 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12920                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12921 00001224 46                      		inc	si
 12922                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12923                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12924 00001225 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12925 00001228 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12926                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12927                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12928 0000122B F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12929                                  	
 12930                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12931                                  		; cf = 0
 12932                                  		;clc
 12933                                  
 12934 0000122D C3                      		retn
 12935                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12936                                  
 12937                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12938 0000122E B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12939 00001230 F9                      		stc
 12940                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12941 00001231 C3                      		retn
 12942                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12943                                  
 12944                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12945                                  
 12946                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12947                                  ;  set media id
 12948                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12949                                  
 12950                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12951                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12952                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12953                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12954                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12955                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12956                                  ;
 12957                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12958                                  ;
 12959                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12960                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12961                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12962                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12963                                  ;
 12964                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12965                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12966                                  ;
 12967                                  ; logic:
 12968                                  ;
 12969                                  ; {
 12970                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12971                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12972                                  ;	BootIo;
 12973                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12974                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12975                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12976                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12977                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12978                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12979                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12980                                  ;		};
 12981                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12982                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12983                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12984                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12985                                  ;		};
 12986                                  ;	else
 12987                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12988                                  ;
 12989                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12990                                  
 12991                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12992                                  SetMediaId:
 12993 00001232 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12994 00001235 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12995                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12996 00001239 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12997 0000123B C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12998 00001240 52                      		push	dx
 12999 00001241 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13000 00001244 5A                      		pop	dx
 13001 00001245 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13002                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13003 00001247 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13004                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13005 0000124C 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13006 0000124E 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13007                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13008 00001253 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13009 00001255 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13010 00001256 57                      		push	di
 13011 00001257 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13012 00001258 07                      		pop	es
 13013 00001259 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13014 0000125C C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13015 00001260 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13016 00001263 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13017 00001266 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13018                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13019                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13020 00001269 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 13021 0000126B 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13022 0000126C 1F                      		pop	ds
 13023 0000126D 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13024 0000126E 07                      		pop	es
 13025 0000126F E864F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13026 00001272 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13027 00001274 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13028 00001279 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13029 0000127C C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13030                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13031                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 13032 00001281 C3                      		retn
 13033                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13034                                  
 13035                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 13036 00001282 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13037 00001284 F9                      		stc
 13038                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 13039 00001285 C3                      		retn
 13040                                  
 13041                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13042                                  
 13043                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13044                                  
 13045                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13046                                  ;	BootIo
 13047                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13048                                  ;
 13049                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13050                                  ;
 13051                                  ; input :
 13052                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13053                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13054                                  ;
 13055                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13056                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13057                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13058                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13059                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13060                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13061                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13062                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13063                                  ;
 13064                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13065                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13066                                  ;
 13067                                  ; logic:
 13068                                  ;
 13069                                  ; {
 13070                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13071                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13072                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13073                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13074                                  ; }
 13075                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13076                                  
 13077                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13078                                  BootIo:	
 13079 00001286 06                      		push	es
 13080 00001287 57                      		push	di
 13081 00001288 53                      		push	bx
 13082 00001289 1E                      		push	ds
 13083 0000128A 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13084                                  
 13085                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13086                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13087                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13088                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13089                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13090                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13091                                  
 13092 0000128B BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13093 0000128E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13094 00001290 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13095 00001294 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13096 00001297 E8CEF6                  		call	diskio
 13097 0000129A 5B                      		pop	bx
 13098 0000129B 5F                      		pop	di
 13099 0000129C 07                      		pop	es
 13100 0000129D C3                      		retn
 13101                                  
 13102                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13103                                  
 13104                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13105                                  
 13106                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13107                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13108                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13109                                  ;
 13110                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13111                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13112                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13113                                  ; history in the flags.
 13114                                  ;
 13115                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13116                                  ;
 13117                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13118                                  ;
 13119                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13120                                  ;
 13121                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13122                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13123                                  ;
 13124                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13125                                  
 13126                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13127 0000129E 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13128 000012A2 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13129 000012A4 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13130                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13131 000012A6 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13132                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13133                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13134 000012AB 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13135 000012AD 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13136 000012B2 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13137 000012B4 E80507                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13138 000012B7 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13139                                  
 13140                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13141                                  
 13142 000012B9 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13143 000012BB CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13144                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13145                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13146 000012BD 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13147 000012BF 53                      		push	bx
 13148 000012C0 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13149                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13150                                  					; physical drive
 13151 000012C3 E8CF06                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13152 000012C6 5B                      		pop	bx
 13153                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13154 000012C7 C3                      		retn

 13160                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13161                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13162                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13163                                  ;
 13164                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13165                                  ;
 13166                                  ; INPUT :
 13167                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13168                                  ;
 13169                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13170                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13171                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13172                                  
 13173                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13174                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 13175 000012C8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13176 000012CC C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13177                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13178                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13179 000012CF 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13180                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13181 000012D1 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13182                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13183                                  					; unformatted_media
 13184 000012D6 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13185 000012D8 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13186                                  
 13187                                  GafDone:				
 13188 000012DA 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13189 000012DD C3                      		retn
 13190                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13191                                  
 13192                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13193                                  
 13194                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13195                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13196                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13197                                  ;
 13198                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13199                                  ;
 13200                                  ; input :
 13201                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13202                                  ;
 13203                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13204                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13205                                  
 13206                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13207                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13208 000012DE C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13209 000012E2 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13210                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13211 000012E5 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13212                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13213                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13214 000012EA 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13215 000012EE 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13216                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13217 000012F0 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13218                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13219                                  					; unformatted_media
 13220                                  saf_Done:				
 13221 000012F5 C3                      		retn
 13222                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13223                                  
 13224                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13225                                  
 13226                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13227                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13228                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13229                                  ;
 13230                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13231                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13232                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13233                                  ;
 13234                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13235                                  
 13236                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13237                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13238 000012F6 06                      		push	es
 13239 000012F7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13240 000012FB 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13241                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13242 000012FF 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13243                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13244 00001301 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13245 00001303 0E                      		push	cs
 13246 00001304 07                      		pop	es
 13247 00001305 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13248                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13249 00001308 BF[D90C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13250                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13251                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13252 0000130B 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13253 0000130D F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13254 0000130F 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13255 00001311 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13256                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13257                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13258                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13259                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13260                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13261                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13262                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 13263 00001314 07                      		pop	es
 13264                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13265                                  		; cf = 0
 13266                                  		;clc
 13267 00001315 C3                      		retn
 13268                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13269                                  nosupport:				
 13270 00001316 07                      		pop	es
 13271 00001317 E9BFED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 13272                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13273                                  
 13274                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13275                                  
 13276                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13277                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13278                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13279                                  ;
 13280                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13281                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13282                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13283                                  ;	    drive)
 13284                                  ;
 13285                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13286                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13287                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13288                                  ;
 13289                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13290                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13291                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13292                                  ;
 13293                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13294                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13295                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13296                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13297                                  ;
 13298                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13299                                  ;
 13300                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13301                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13302                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13303                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13304                                  ; 
 13305                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13306                                  
 13307                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13308                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13309 0000131A C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13310 0000131E C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13311                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13312                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13313 00001321 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13314 00001323 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13315                                  		;
 13316 00001325 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13317                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13318                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13319                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13320 00001329 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13321                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13322 0000132B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13323 0000132D 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13324 0000132F FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13325                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13326 00001331 FEC8                    		dec	al
 13327 00001333 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13328 00001335 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13329 00001337 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13330 00001339 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13331 0000133B 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13332 0000133D 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13333 0000133F 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13334                                  GotMediaType:				
 13335 00001341 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13336                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13337                                  		; cf = 0
 13338                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13339 00001344 C3                      		retn
 13340                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13341                                  
 13342                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13343 00001345 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13344 00001348 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13345 0000134A B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13346 0000134C 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13347 0000134F 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13348                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13349 00001351 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13350                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13351 00001353 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13352 00001355 F9                      		stc
 13353 00001356 C3                      		retn
 13354                                  
 13355                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13356                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13357                                  		;db    0
 13358                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13359                                  
 13360                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13361                                  
 13362                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13363                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13364                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13365                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13366                                  
 13367                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13368                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13369                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13370                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13371                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13372                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13373                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13374                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13375                                  ;
 13376                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13377                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13378                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13379                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13380                                  ;
 13381                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13382                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13383                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13384                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13385                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13386                                  ;
 13387                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13388                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13389                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13390                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13391                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13392                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13393                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13394                                  
 13395                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13396                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13397                                  
 13398                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13399                                  
 13400                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13401 00001357 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13402 0000135A 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13403 0000135C 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13404 0000135F 743B                    		jz	short mine
 13405                                  
 13406                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13407                                  
 13408 00001361 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 13409 00001364 7479                    		jz	short win386call
 13410 00001366 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 13411 00001369 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 13412 0000136B E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 13413                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13414                                  
 13415                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 13416 0000136E CF                      		iret
 13417                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13418

 13421 00001370 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 13422                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 13423                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13424                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13425 00001372 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13426                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13427                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13428                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13429                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13430                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13431 00001377 FF36[B400]              		push	word [Orig13]
 13432 0000137B FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13433 0000137F FF36[0601]              		push	word [Old13]
 13434 00001383 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13435                                  
 13436                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13437                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 13438                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 13439                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 13440 00001387 8916[B400]              		mov	[Orig13], dx
 13441 0000138B A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 13442 0000138E 891E[0601]              		mov	[Old13], bx
 13443 00001392 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 13444                                  
 13445 00001396 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 13446 00001397 5B                      		pop	bx
 13447 00001398 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 13448 00001399 5A                      		pop	dx
 13449 0000139A 58                      		pop	ax
 13450                                  i2f_iret:				
 13451 0000139B CF                      		iret
 13452                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13453                                  
 13454                                  mine:
 13455 0000139C 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions

 13523                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 13524                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 13525                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 13526                                  
 13527                                  win386call:				
 13528 000013DF 1E                      		push	ds
 13529 000013E0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13530                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13531                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 13532 000013E5 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 13533                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 13534 000013E7 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 13535 000013E9 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 13536                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 13537 000013EB 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 13538                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13539 000013ED F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 13540                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13541 000013F0 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13542                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 13543 000013F2 8026[6F08]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 13544 000013F7 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret

 13552                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present

 13554                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next, bx	; Hook our structure into chain
 13555                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es
 13556 00001403 891E[3D08]              		mov	[SI_Next], bx

 13559 0000140B BB[3B08]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 13560 0000140E 1E                      		push	ds
 13561 0000140F 07                      		pop	es
 13562                                  win_iret:

 13564                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022

 13568                                  handle_multmult:

 13570 00001415 7515                    		jnz	short try_2
 13571 00001417 1E                      		push	ds
 13572 00001418 E84700                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13573                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13574                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 13575                                  		;dec	bx
 13576 0000141B BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 13577 0000141E 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 13578 00001420 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 13579 00001422 F7D3                    		not	bx
 13580 00001424 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 13581 00001426 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 13582 00001428 43                      		inc	bx
 13583                                  try_1:

 13585 0000142A EBE5                    		jmp	short ii2f_iret

 13587                                  
 13588                                  try_2:

 13590 0000142E 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 13591 00001430 1E                      		push	ds

 13593                                  		;xor	di, di
 13594                                  		;dec	di
 13595 00001431 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 13596 00001434 8EC7                    		mov	es, di

 13598 00001439 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
