 14673                                  
 14674                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14675                                  
 14676                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14677                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14678                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14679                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14680                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14681                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14682                                  
 14683                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14684 0000181A 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14685 0000181C 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14685 00001825 736B6574746520666F-
 14685 0000182E 7220647269766520   
 14686                                  
 14687                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14688 00001836 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14688 0000183F 65737320616E79206B-
 14688 00001848 6579207768656E2072-
 14688 00001851 656164790D0A       
 14689 00001857 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14690                                  
 14691                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14692                                  
 14693                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14694                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14695                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14696                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14697                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14698                                  
 14699                                  chkopcnt:		
 14700 00001859 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14701 0000185E C3                      		retn
 14702                                  
 14703                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14704                                  
 14705                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14706                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14707                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14708                                  ;
 14709                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14710                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14711                                  
 14712                                  mediacheck:	
 14713 0000185F E878F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14714 00001862 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14715 00001864 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14716 00001867 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14717 00001869 E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14718 0000186C 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14719 0000186E 50                      		push	ax
 14720 0000186F 52                      		push	dx
 14721 00001870 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14722                                  					; set logical drive number
 14723 00001874 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14724 00001876 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14725                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14726                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14727 00001878 5A                      		pop	dx
 14728 00001879 58                      		pop	ax
 14729 0000187A 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14730 0000187C BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14731                                  
 14732                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14733                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14734                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14735                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14736                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14737                                  ; status.
 14738                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14739 0000187F 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14740 00001883 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14741                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14742                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14743                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14744                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14745 00001887 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14746                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14747                                  
 14748                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14749                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14750                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14751                                  
 14752 00001889 50                      		push	ax
 14753 0000188A 51                      		push	cx
 14754 0000188B 52                      		push	dx
 14755 0000188C E867ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14756 0000188F 5A                      		pop	dx
 14757 00001890 59                      		pop	cx
 14758 00001891 58                      		pop	ax
 14759 00001892 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14760 00001894 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14761                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14762 00001896 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14763                                  mediaret:				
 14764 00001898 C3                      		retn
 14765                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14766                                  
 14767                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14768                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14769                                  ; or write.
 14770                                  
 14771                                  mediadovolid:				
 14772 00001899 E8FAED                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14773 0000189C 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14774 0000189E E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14775 000018A1 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14776 000018A3 E9C9F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14778                                  
 14779                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14780                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14781                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14782                                  ; dos.
 14783                                  ;
 14784                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14785                                  
 14786                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14787                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14788                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14789                                  
 14790                                  checklatchio:	
 14791                                  
 14792                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14793                                  			
 14794 000018A6 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14795 000018A9 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14796                                  
 14797                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14798                                  
 14799 000018AB E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14800 000018AE 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14801                                  
 14802                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14803                                  ; expensive verification.
 14804                                  
 14805 000018B0 E8E3ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14806 000018B3 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14807 000018B5 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14808 000018B8 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14809 000018BA 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14810 000018BC 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14811 000018BE E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14812                                  checklatchret:				
 14813 000018C1 E8ABF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14814                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14815 000018C4 F9                      		stc
 14816 000018C5 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14817                                  checkret:				
 14818 000018C6 C3                      		retn
 14819                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14820                                  
 14821                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14822                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14823                                  ;
 14824                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14825                                  
 14826                                  checkfatvid:				
 14827 000018C7 E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14828 000018CA 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14829 000018CC 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14830                                  
 14831                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14832                                  
 14833                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14834                                  
 14835                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14836                                  
 14837                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14838                                  ;
 14839                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14840                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14841                                  ;
 14842                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14843                                  ;
 14844                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14845                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14846                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14847                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14848                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14849                                  ;
 14850                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14851                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14852                                  ; routine.)
 14853                                  ;
 14854                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14855                                  
 14856                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14857                                  check_vid:
 14858                                  
 14859                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14860                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14861                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14862                                  
 14863 000018CE 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14864                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14865                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14866 000018D3 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14867 000018D5 E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14868 000018D8 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14869 000018DA 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14870 000018DC 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14871                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14872 000018E1 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14873                                  					; if not fat system
 14874 000018E3 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14875 000018E6 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14876 000018E8 E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14877 000018EB BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14878                                  					; definitely changed
 14879 000018EE 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14880                                  
 14881 000018F0 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14882                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14883 000018F1 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14884                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14885                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14886                                  		;clc
 14887                                  checkfatret:				
 14888 000018F4 C3                      		retn
 14889                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14890                                  
 14891                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14892                                  changed_drv:
 14893 000018F5 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14894 000018F6 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14895                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14896 000018FB C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14897                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14898                                  
 14899                                  ; extended id check
 14900                                  
 14901                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14902                                  
 14903                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14904                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14905                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14906                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14907                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14908                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14909                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14910                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14911                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14912                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14913                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14914                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14915                                  ;
 14916                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14917                                  
 14918                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14919                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14920 000018FC 50                      		push	ax
 14921                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14922                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14923 000018FD A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14924 00001900 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14925 00001904 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14926 00001906 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14927 00001909 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14928 0000190D 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14929 0000190F 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14930                                  					; don't know
 14931 00001911 58                      		pop	ax
 14932 00001912 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14933                                  					; reset the flag
 14934                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14935                                  
 14936                                  ext_changed:				
 14937 00001914 58                      		pop	ax
 14938 00001915 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14939                                  					; disk changed!
 14940                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14941                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14942                                  		;clc
 14943 00001918 EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14944                                  
 14945                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14946                                  
 14947                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14948                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14949                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14950                                  ;
 14951                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14952                                  
 14953                                  checkio:				
 14954 0000191A 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14955 0000191D 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14956 0000191F E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14957 00001922 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14958 00001924 E86FED                  		call	GetBp
 14959 00001927 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14960 00001929 E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14961 0000192C 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14962 0000192E 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14963 00001930 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14964 00001932 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14965 00001933 C3                      		retn
 14966                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14967                                  
 14968                                  checkioerr:				
 14969 00001934 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14970                                  
 14971                                  checkioret:				
 14972 00001937 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14973 00001938 E9E4F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14974                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14975                                  
 14976                                  no_error_map:				
 14977 0000193B E9E4F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14978                                  
 14979                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14980                                  
 14981                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14982                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14983                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14984                                  
 14985                                  returnvid:		
 14986 0000193E BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14987                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14988 00001941 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14989 00001944 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14990 00001946 F9                      		stc
 14991 00001947 C3                      		retn
 14992                                  
 14993                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14994                                  
 14995                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14996                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14997                                  ;
 14998                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14999                                  ; **trashes si**
 15000                                  
 15001                                  media_set_vid:				
 15002 00001948 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15003                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15004                                  
 15005                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15006                                  
 15007                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15008                                  
 15009                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15010                                  
 15011                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15012                                  vid_into_packet:
 15013 0000194B 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15014 0000194C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15015 00001950 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15016 00001953 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15017 00001955 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15018 00001958 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15019 0000195B 1F                      		pop	ds
 15020                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15021 0000195C C3                      		retn
 15022                                  
 15023                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15024                                  
 15025                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15026                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15027                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15028                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15029                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15030                                  ;
 15031                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15032                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15033                                  ;
 15034                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15035                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15036                                  ;		carry set
 15037                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15038                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15039                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15040                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15041                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15042                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15043                                  ;
 15044                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15045                                  
 15046                                  hidensity:
 15047                                  
 15048                                  ; check for correct drive
 15049                                  		
 15050                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15051 0000195D 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15052                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15053                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15054 00001962 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15055                                  
 15056                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15057                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15058                                  
 15059 00001964 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15060 00001969 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15061                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15062                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15063 0000196B 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15064 0000196E 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15065                                  
 15066                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15067                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15068                                  
 15069 00001970 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15070                                  					; ffOther
 15071 00001975 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 15072 00001977 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15073                                  					; ff288
 15074 0000197C 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 15075 0000197E B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15076 00001980 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15077                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15078                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15079 00001983 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15080                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15081                                  					; 2 sides
 15082 00001986 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15083                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15084                                  					; & head max
 15085 00001989 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15086 0000198C E979ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15087                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15088                                  
 15089                                  Is720K:					
 15090 0000198F 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15091 00001992 E93AED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15092                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15093                                  
 15094                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15095                                  ;dofloppy:				
 15096                                  		;retn
 15097                                  
 15098                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15099                                  
 15100                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15101                                  
 15102                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15103                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15104                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15105                                  ;
 15106                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15107                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15108                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15109                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15110                                  ;
 15111                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15112                                  ;
 15113                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15114                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15115                                  
 15116                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15117 00001995 06                      		push	es
 15118 00001996 57                      		push	di
 15119                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15120                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15121 00001997 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15122                                  
 15123                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15124                                  
 15125                                  scan_bds:				
 15126 0000199B 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15127 0000199F 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15128                                  
 15129                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15130                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15131                                  
 15132 000019A1 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15133                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15134                                  get_next_bds:				
 15135 000019A5 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15136                                  					; go to	next bds
 15137 000019A8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15138 000019AB 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15139 000019AD 5F                      		pop	di
 15140 000019AE 07                      		pop	es
 15141 000019AF C3                      		retn
 15142                                  
 15143                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15144                                  
 15145                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15146                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15147                                  ;
 15148                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15149                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15150                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15151                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15152                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15153                                  
 15154                                  checkromchange:	
 15155                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15156                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15157 000019B0 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15158                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15159                                  					; fchanged
 15160 000019B5 C3                      		retn
 15161                                  
 15162                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15163                                  
 15164                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15165                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15166                                  ;
 15167                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15168                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15169                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15170                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15171                                  
 15172                                  resetchanged:	
 15173                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15174                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15175 000019B6 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15176                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15177                                  					; ~fchanged
 15178 000019BB C3                      		retn
 15179                                  
 15180                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15181                                  
 15182                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15183                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15184                                  ;
 15185                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15186                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15187                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15188                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15189                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15190                                  
 15191                                  haschange:
 15192                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15193                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15194 000019BC 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15195                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15196                                  					; fchangeline
 15197 000019C1 C3                      		retn
 15198                                  
 15199                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15200                                  
 15201                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15202                                  
 15203                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15204                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15205                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15206                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15207                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15208                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15209                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15210                                  
 15211                                  ; set_volume_id
 15212                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15213                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15214                                  ;
 15215                                  ;   on entry:
 15216                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15217                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15218                                  ;
 15219                                  ;   on exit:
 15220                                  ;	carry clear:
 15221                                  ;	   successful call
 15222                                  ;	carry set
 15223                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15224                                  
 15225                                  set_volume_id:				
 15226 000019C2 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15227 000019C3 50                      		push	ax
 15228 000019C4 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15229 000019C7 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15230 000019C9 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15231 000019CC 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15232 000019CE E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15233 000019D1 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15234                                  setvret:				
 15235                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15236                                  		; cf = 0
 15237                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15238 000019D4 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15239 000019D5 5A                      		pop	dx
 15240 000019D6 C3                      		retn
 15241                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15242                                  
 15243                                  seterr:					
 15244 000019D7 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15245 000019D8 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15246 000019D9 C3                      		retn
 15247                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15248 000019DA 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15249                                  
 15250                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15251                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15252                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15253                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15254                                  
 15255                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15256                                  
 15257                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15258                                  
 15259                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15260                                  ;
 15261                                  ;   on entry:
 15262                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15263                                  ;
 15264                                  ;   on exit:
 15265                                  ;	carry clear
 15266                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15267                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15268                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15269                                  ;
 15270                                  ;	carry set:
 15271                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15272                                  
 15273                                  read_volume_id:
 15274 000019DC 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15275 000019DD 51                      		push	cx
 15276 000019DE 53                      		push	bx
 15277 000019DF 50                      		push	ax
 15278 000019E0 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15279 000019E1 57                      		push	di
 15280 000019E2 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15281 000019E3 07                      		pop	es
 15282 000019E4 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15283 000019E7 BE[9F08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15284 000019EA B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15285 000019ED F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15286 000019EF 5F                      		pop	di
 15287 000019F0 07                      		pop	es
 15288 000019F1 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15289                                  					; # of fats
 15290 000019F5 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15291                                  					; sectors / fat
 15292 000019F9 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15293 000019FB 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15294                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15295                                  					;
 15296                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15297                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15298 000019FF 2EA3[DA19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15299                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15300                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15301 00001A03 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15302                                  					; # root dir entries
 15303 00001A07 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15304 00001A09 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15305 00001A0B 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15306                                  next_sec:				
 15307 00001A0D 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15308 00001A0E 2EA1[DA19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15309                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15310                                  					; get sector #
 15311 00001A12 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15312                                  					; sectors / track
 15313 00001A16 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15314 00001A18 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15315                                  
 15316                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15317                                  
 15318 00001A1A 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15319                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15320 00001A1B 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15321 00001A1D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15322 00001A1F 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15323                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15324 00001A23 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15325 00001A25 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15326 00001A27 E8EEED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15327                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15328 00001A2A 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 15329 00001A2C B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15330 00001A2F B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15331                                  fvid_loop:				
 15332 00001A31 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15333 00001A34 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15334 00001A36 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15335 00001A39 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15336 00001A3B 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15337 00001A3E 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15338                                  ent_loop:				
 15339 00001A40 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15340 00001A43 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15341 00001A45 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15342 00001A46 2EFF06[DA19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15343                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15344                                  					; next sector
 15345 00001A4B E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15346                                  notfound:				
 15347 00001A4D 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15348 00001A4F EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15349                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15350                                  
 15351                                  found_vid:				
 15352 00001A51 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15353 00001A52 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15354 00001A54 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15355 00001A55 57                      		push	di
 15356 00001A56 1E                      		push	ds
 15357 00001A57 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15358 00001A58 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15359 00001A5B B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15360                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15361 00001A5E F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15362 00001A60 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 15363 00001A62 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15364 00001A63 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15365 00001A65 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15366 00001A66 07                      		pop	es
 15367                                  fvid_ret:				
 15368 00001A67 58                      		pop	ax
 15369                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15370                                  		; cf = 0
 15371                                  		;clc
 15372                                  rvidret:				
 15373 00001A68 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15374 00001A69 59                      		pop	cx
 15375 00001A6A 5A                      		pop	dx
 15376 00001A6B C3                      		retn
 15377                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15378                                  
 15379                                  no_vid:					
 15380 00001A6C 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15381 00001A6D EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15382                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15383                                  
 15384                                  readviderr:				
 15385 00001A6F 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15386 00001A70 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15387 00001A71 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15388                                  
 15389                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15390                                  
 15391                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15392                                  ;
 15393                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15394                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15395                                  
 15396                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 15397 00001A73 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15398 00001A74 56                      		push	si
 15399 00001A75 51                      		push	cx
 15400 00001A76 BE[AB08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15401                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 15402 00001A79 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15403                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15404 00001A7C B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15405 00001A7F FC                      		cld
 15406 00001A80 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15407 00001A82 59                      		pop	cx
 15408 00001A83 5E                      		pop	si
 15409 00001A84 5F                      		pop	di
 15410 00001A85 C3                      		retn
 15411                                  
 15412                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15413                                  
 15414                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15415                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15416                                  ;
 15417                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15418                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15419                                  
 15420                                  check_volume_id:	
 15421 00001A86 57                      		push	di
 15422 00001A87 51                      		push	cx
 15423 00001A88 BE[AB08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15424                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 15425 00001A8B 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15426                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15427 00001A8E B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15428 00001A91 FC                      		cld
 15429 00001A92 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15430 00001A94 59                      		pop	cx
 15431 00001A95 5F                      		pop	di
 15432 00001A96 C3                      		retn
 15433                                  
 15434                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15435                                  
 15436                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15437                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15438                                  ;
 15439                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15440                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15441                                  ;
 15442                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15443                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15444                                  ;
 15445                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15446                                  
 15447                                  fat_check:		
 15448 00001A97 50                      		push	ax
 15449 00001A98 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15450 00001A9A A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15451 00001A9D 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15452                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15453 00001AA1 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15454 00001AA3 4E                      		dec	si
 15455                                  okret1:					
 15456 00001AA4 58                      		pop	ax
 15457 00001AA5 C3                      		retn
 15458                                  
 15459                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15460                                  
 15461                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15462                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15463                                  
 15464                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15465                                  
 15466                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15467                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15468                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15469                                  
 15470                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15471                                  
 15472                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15473                                  		;db 0
 15474                                  
 15475                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15476                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15477                                  
 15478                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 15479 00001AA6 00<rep Ah>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15480                                  %endif
 15481                                  
 15482                                  ;align 16
 15483                                  
 15484                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15485                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15486                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15487                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15488                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15489                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15490                                  
 15491                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 15492                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 15493                                  
 15494                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 15495

 15497                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 15498                                  ; ============================================================================
 15499                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 15540                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15541                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 15542                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN)
