 33258                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33259                                  ;
 33260                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33261                                  ;
 33262                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33263                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33264                                  ;
 33265                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 33266                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33267                                  ;
 33268                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 33269                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 33270                                  ;
 33271                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33272                                  
 33273                                  ; 13/05/2019
 33274                                  
 33275                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33276                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 33277                                  
 33278                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33279                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 33280                                  GetHexNum:
 33281 0000329D 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 33282 0000329F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33283                                  ghn_next:
 33284 000032A1 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 33285 000032A4 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 33286 000032A7 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 33287 000032A9 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 33288 000032AC 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 33289 000032AE 50                      	push	ax
 33290 000032AF 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 33291 000032B1 E80210                  	call	delim
 33292 000032B4 58                      	pop	ax
 33293                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33294 000032B5 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 33295 000032B8 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 33296 000032BA E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 33297                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 33298                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33299 000032BD 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 33300                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33301                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33302                                  ghn_shift1:
 33303 000032BF D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 33304 000032C1 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 33305 000032C3 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 33306 000032C5 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 33307 000032C7 46                      	inc	si
 33308 000032C8 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 33309                                  ghn_into_paras:
 33310 000032CA 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 33311 000032CD 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33312 000032D0 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 33313 000032D4 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 33314                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33315                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33316                                  ghn_shift2:
 33317 000032D6 F8                      	clc
 33318 000032D7 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 33319 000032D9 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 33320 000032DB E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 33321 000032DD F8                      	clc
 33322 000032DE C3                      	retn
 33323                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33324                                  ghn_err:
 33325                                  gnib_err:
 33326 000032DF F9                      	stc
 33327                                  ghn_ret:
 33328                                  gnib_ret:
 33329 000032E0 C3                      	retn

 33333                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 33334                                  ;
 33335                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 33336                                  ;
 33337                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 33338                                  ;
 33339                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 33340                                  ;
 33341                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33342                                  
 33343                                  GetNibble:
 33344 000032E1 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 33345                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 33346                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33347 000032E4 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 33348 000032E6 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 33349 000032E9 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 33350 000032EB 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 33351 000032EE C3                      	retn
 33352                                  is_it_hex:
 33353 000032EF 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 33354                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 33355                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33356 000032F2 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 33357 000032F4 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 33358 000032F7 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 33359 000032F9 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 33360 000032FC C3                      	retn
 33361                                  	; 11/12/2022

 33363                                  ;	stc
 33364                                  ;gnib_ret:
 33365                                  ;	retn

 33450                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33451                                  ;
 33452                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 33453                                  ;
 33454                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 33455                                  ;
 33456                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 33457                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 33458                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 33459                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 33460                                  ;				NC
 33461                                  ;			  else 
 33462                                  ;				CY
 33463                                  ;
 33464                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 33465                                  ;
 33466                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33467                                  
 33468                                  umb_allocate:
 33469                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33470                                  	; ds = cs
 33471 0000333E 50                      	push	ax
 33472 0000333F B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 33473 00003341 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 33474                                  					;   possible
 33475                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33476 00003344 FF1E[C51F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 33477                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 33478                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 33479                                  					; the largest UMB
 33480 00003348 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 33481 0000334A 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 33482                                  	
 33483 0000334C B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 33484                                  
 33485                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33486 0000334E FF1E[C51F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 33487                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 33488                                  
 33489 00003352 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 33490                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 33491                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33492 00003355 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 33493                                  ua_err:
 33494 00003357 F9                      	stc	
 33495                                  
 33496                                  	;clc
 33497                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33498                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33499                                  	; cf=0
 33500                                  	;clc 
 33501                                  ua_done:
 33502 00003358 58                      	pop	ax
 33503 00003359 C3                      	retn
 33504                                  	; 27/07/2023
 33505                                  ;ua_err:
 33506                                  	;stc
 33507                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 33508                                  
 33509                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33510                                  ;
 33511                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 33512                                  ;
 33513                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 33514                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 33515                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 33516                                  ;			; DS = data
 33517                                  ;
 33518                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 33519                                  ;
 33520                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 33521                                  ;
 33522                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33523                                  
 33524                                  umb_insert:
 33525 0000335A 1E                      	push	ds
 33526                                  
 33527                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33528                                  	; ds = cs
 33529                                  
 33530                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33531 0000335B 8E1E[DC1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 33532                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 33533 0000335F 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 33534 00003363 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 33535 00003365 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33536                                  ui_next:
 33537 00003367 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 33538                                  					;    new block
 33539 00003369 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 33540                                  					; Q: is current block the
 33541                                  					;    last
 33542 0000336B 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33543 00003371 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 33544                                  					; N: get next block
 33545 00003373 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 33546                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 33547 00003375 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33548 00003378 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 33549                                  
 33550                                  ui_insert:
 33551 0000337A 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 33552 0000337C 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 33553                                  
 33554 0000337D 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 33555 0000337F F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 33556                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 33557 00003381 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33558                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 33559 00003386 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33560                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 33561 0000338C 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 33562                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 33563 00003390 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33564                                  
 33565                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33566                                  
 33567 00003396 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33568 00003398 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33569 0000339E 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 33570                                  					; mark as free
 33571 000033A5 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 33572                                  					; start & end of new block
 33573 000033A8 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 33574                                  
 33575                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 33576                                  	
 33577 000033AD 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 33578 000033AF 43                      	inc	bx
 33579 000033B0 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 33580 000033B2 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 33581                                  
 33582                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 33583                                  					; this block
 33584 000033B3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 33585                                  	
 33586 000033B5 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33587 000033BB 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33588 000033C2 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33589 000033C6 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33590                                  
 33591 000033CD EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 33592                                  
 33593                                  ui_append:
 33594                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 33595 000033CF 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 33596 000033D4 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 33597                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 33598                                  					; block for the next arena.
 33599                                  	; 13/05/2019
 33600 000033DA 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33601                                  
 33602 000033E0 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 33603 000033E2 40                      	inc	ax
 33604 000033E3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 33605                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 33606 000033E5 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33607                                  
 33608 000033E7 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 33609                                  
 33610 000033E9 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33611 000033EF 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33612 000033F6 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33613 000033FA 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 33614                                  
 33615                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33616 00003401 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33617 00003403 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 33618 00003409 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 33619                                  					; mark as free
 33620 00003410 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33621 00003411 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33622                                  ui_done:
 33623                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 33624 00003416 1F                      	pop	ds
 33625                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33626                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 33627 00003417 C3                      	retn
 33628                                  
 33629                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33630                                  
 33631                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33632                                  ;
 33633                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 33634                                  ;
 33635                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 33636                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 33637                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 33638                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 33639                                  ;
 33640                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 33641                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 33642                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 33643                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 33644                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 33645                                  ;
 33646                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33647                                  
 33648                                  umb_coalesce:
 33649                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33650                                  	; ds = cs
 33651 00003418 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 33652                                  
 33653 00003419 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 33654                                  
 33655                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33656                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33657 0000341B 8E06[DC1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33658 0000341F 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 33659                                  uc_nextfree:
 33660 00003424 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33661 00003426 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33662                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 33663 00003428 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 33664 0000342D 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 33665                                  					; N: get next arena
 33666 0000342F E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 33667 00003432 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33668 00003434 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 33669                                  uc_again:
 33670 00003436 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 33671 00003439 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33672                                  uc_check:
 33673 0000343B 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 33674 00003440 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 33675                                  					; Y: coalesce
 33676 00003442 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 33677 00003447 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 33678                                  	;add	[3],cx
 33679 00003448 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 33680 0000344C 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 33681 0000344F 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 33682 00003451 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 33683                                  
 33684                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33685                                  ;uc_done:
 33686                                  	;retn
 33687                                  
 33688                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33689                                  ;
 33690                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 33691                                  ;
 33692                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 33693                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 33694                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 33695                                  ;
 33696                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33697                                  
 33698                                  	; 01/11/2022
 33699                                  get_next:
 33700 00003453 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33701 00003458 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 33702                                  _get_next_:
 33703 0000345A 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 33704 0000345C 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 33705 00003460 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 33706 00003461 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33707                                  	;clc
 33708                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33709                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33710                                  	; cf=0
 33711                                  	;clc
 33712 00003463 C3                      	retn
 33713                                  gn_err:
 33714 00003464 F9                      	stc
 33715                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 33716                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 33717 00003465 C3                      	retn
 33718                                  
 33719                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33720                                  ;
 33721                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 33722                                  ;
 33723                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33724                                  
 33725                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33726                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 33727                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 33728                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33729                                  	; ds = cs
 33730 00003466 E8D5FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 33731 00003469 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33732                                  
 33733                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 33734                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 33735                                  
 33736                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33737                                  	; ds = cs
 33738                                  
 33739 0000346B CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 33740 0000346D B106                    	mov	cl,6
 33741 0000346F D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 33742                                  
 33743 00003471 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 33744 00003473 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 33745                                  
 33746 00003475 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33747                                  
 33748 00003477 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 33749 0000347A 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 33750                                  	
 33751 0000347C 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33752 00003482 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33753                                  					
 33754 00003489 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33755 0000348D 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33756                                  
 33757                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 33758                                  
 33759 00003494 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 33760 00003496 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33761 0000349C 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 33762                                  					; mark as free 
 33763 000034A3 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33764 000034A4 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33765                                  
 33766                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33767                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33768 000034A9 8E06[DC1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 33769 000034AD BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 33770 000034B0 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 33771                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 33772                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 33773                                  
 33774                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 33775                                  
 33776 000034B3 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 33777 000034B6 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 33778 000034B9 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 33779                                  ;scan_next
 33780                                  ; 09/12/2022
 33781                                  scannext:
 33782 000034BB 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 33783 000034BF 740C                    	je	short got_last
 33784                                  	
 33785 000034C1 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33786 000034C3 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33787 000034C8 40                      	inc	ax
 33788 000034C9 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33789                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 33790                                  	; 09/12/2022
 33791 000034CB EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 33792                                  got_last:
 33793 000034CD 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 33794 000034D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33795                                  	;clc
 33796                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33797                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33798                                  	; cf=0
 33799                                  	;clc
 33800 000034D9 C3                      	retn
 33801                                  
 33802                                  ; 11/12/2022
 33803                                  ;;lfu_err:
 33804                                  ;	;stc
 33805                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33806                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 33807                                  ;	; cf=1
 33808                                  ;	;stc
 33809                                  ;	retn
 33810                                  
 33811                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33812                                  ;
 33813                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 33814                                  ;
 33815                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 33816                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 33817                                  ;
 33818                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33819                                  
 33820                                  ShrinkUMB:
 33821                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33822                                  	; ds = cs
 33823 000034DA 833E[BF1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 33824                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 33825 000034DF 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 33826 000034E1 06                      	push	es
 33827                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33828                                  	;push	bx
 33829                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33830                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 33831                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33832                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33833 000034E2 8B1E[C31F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 33834 000034E6 2B1E[BF1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33835 000034EA 8E06[BF1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 33836                                  	
 33837 000034EE B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 33838 000034F1 CD21                    	int	21h
 33839                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 33840                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 33841                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 33842 000034F3 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33843 000034F5 48                      	dec	ax
 33844 000034F6 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33845 000034F8 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 33846                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33847                                  	;pop	bx
 33848 000034FF 07                      	pop	es
 33849                                  su_exit:
 33850 00003500 C3                      	retn

 33857                                  ;

 33860                                  UnlinkUMB:
 33861                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33862                                  	; ds = cs
 33863 00003501 1E                      	push	ds
 33864 00003502 06                      	push	es
 33865                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33866 00003503 803E[DB1F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 33867                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 33868 00003508 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 33869                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33870 0000350A 8E06[DC1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33871                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 33872 0000350E 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 33873 00003513 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 33874                                  ulu_next:
 33875 00003518 E838FF                  	call	get_next
 33876 0000351B 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 33877 0000351D 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 33878 0000351F 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 33879 00003521 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33880 00003523 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 33881                                  ulu_found:
 33882                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 33883 00003525 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33884                                  ulu_x:

 33886 0000352B 1F                      	pop	ds
 33887 0000352C C3                      	retn

 33889                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33890                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 33891                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33892                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33893                                  
 33894                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33895                                  ;
 33896                                  ; Summary:
 33897                                  ;
 33898                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 33899                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 33900                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 33901                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 33902                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 33903                                  ;
 33904                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 33905                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 33906                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 33907                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 33908                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 33909                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 33910                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 33911                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 33912                                  ;
 33913                                  ; Example:
 33914                                  ;
 33915                                  ;   [menu]
 33916                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 33917                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 33918                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 33919                                  ;
 33920                                  ;   [network]
 33921                                  ;   include misc
 33922                                  ;   device=foo
 33923                                  ;
 33924                                  ;   [misc]
 33925                                  ;   device=bar
 33926                                  ;   include alternate
 33927                                  ;
 33928                                  ;   [alternate]
 33929                                  ;   device=tar
 33930                                  ;
 33931                                  ;
 33932                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 33933                                  ;
 33934                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 33935                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 33936                                  ;
 33937                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 33938                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 33939                                  ;   following order:
 33940                                  ;
 33941                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 33942                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 33943                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 33944                                  ;
 33945                                  
 33946                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 33947                                  
 33948                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 33949                                  
 33950                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 33951                                  
 33952                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 33953                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 33954                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 33955                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 33956                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 33957                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 33958                                  
 33959                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33960                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33961                                  
 33962                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 33963                                  
 33964                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33965                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 33966                                  
 33967 0000352D 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 33989 00003537 8A1E[084A]              	mov	bl,[drive]

 33993                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 33994 0000353C BA[E048]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters

 34003 00003545 CD21                    	int	21h
 34004

 34006 00003547 8A26[094A]              	mov	ah,[switches]
 34007                                  	;mov	al,[deviceparameters+20]
 34008 0000354B A0[F448]                	mov	al,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 34009 0000354E 8A0E[084A]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 34010                                  ;
 34011                                  ;; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34012                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 34013                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 34014                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 34015                                  ;	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 34016                                  ;	;mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 34017                                  ;
 34018                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 34019                                  ;	;;test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34020                                  ;	;test	byte [cs:switches],flagec35
 34021                                  ;	;jz	short not_ec35
 34022                                  ;
 34023                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 34024                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34025                                  ;	;;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34026                                  ;	; 12/12/2022

 34028                                  ;	;jz	short eot_ok
 34029                                  ;

 34101                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 34103                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34104                                  ;
 34105                                  ; procedure : parseline
 34106                                  ;
 34107                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 34108                                  ;
 34109                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34110                                  
 34111                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34112                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 34113                                  
 34114                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34115                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 34116                                  parseline:
 34117                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34118                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 34119                                  
 34120                                  	;push	ds ; *
 34121                                  
 34122                                  	;push	cs ; *
 34123                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 34124                                  
 34125                                  nextswtch:
 34126                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 34127                                  	je	short done_line
 34128                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 34129                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 34130                                  
 34131                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 34132                                  
 34133                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 34134                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 34135                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 34136                                  	je	short getparm
 34137                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 34138                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 34139                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34140                                  swterr:
 34141                                  	retn
 34142                                  
 34143                                  getparm:
 34144                                  	call	check_switch
 34145                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 34146                                  	jc	short swterr
 34147                                  getnext:
 34148                                  	call	getchr
 34149                                  	;jc	short done_line
 34150                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 34151                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34152                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 34153                                  ;swterr:
 34154                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 34155                                  
 34156                                  done_line:
 34157                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34158                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 34159                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 34160                                  	jnz	short okay
 34161                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 34162                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 34163                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34164                                  	retn
 34165                                  
 34166                                  okay:
 34167                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 34168                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 34169                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 34170                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 34171                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 34172                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34173                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34174                                  	; cf=0
 34175                                  	;clc
 34176                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 34177                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34178                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 34179                                  ;exitpl:
 34180                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34181                                  	; ds = cs
 34182                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 34183                                  	retn
 34184                                  put_back:
 34185                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 34186                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 34187                                  	jmp	short done_line
 34188                                  
 34189                                  %endif

 34191                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34192                                  ;
 34193                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34194                                  ;
 34195                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34196                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 34197                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 34198                                  ; error.
 34199                                  ;
 34200                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34201                                  
 34202                                  check_switch:

 34204                                  	;jc	short err_check

 34206 00003594 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 34207 00003596 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 34208                                  	;jb	short err_check
 34209 00003598 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 34214

 34221 000035AA F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 34222                                  
 34223 000035AC 07                      	pop	es
 34224 000035AD 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 34225

 34228 000035B4 8B1E[094A]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 34229 000035B8 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 34230 000035BA 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 34231                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34232 000035BC A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 34233                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow

 34256                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected

 34282                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the

 34455                                  ;
 34456                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 34457                                  ;
 34458                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 34459                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 34460                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 34461                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 34462                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 34463                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 34464                                  ;
 34465                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 34466                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 34467                                  ;
 34468                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 34469                                  ;
 34470                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34471                                  
 34472                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34473                                  
 34474                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34475                                  
 34476                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34477                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 34478                                  
 34479                                  setdeviceparameters:
 34480                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34481                                  	; ds = cs
 34482                                  
 34483 00003657 06                      	push	es
 34484                                  
 34485 00003658 0E                      	push	cs
 34486 00003659 07                      	pop	es
 34487                                  
 34488 0000365A 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 34489 0000365C 8A1E[E148]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]

 34491 00003663 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 34492

 34494                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 34495                                  got_80:

 34497 0000366D 8BB7[884A]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 34498

 34500                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34501 00003671 BF[E748]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb

 34518

 34523 0000368D 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered

 34527 00003692 A3[F648]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 34528                                  
 34529                                  heads_not_altered:
 34530                                  
 34531                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 34532                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 34533                                  
 34534                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 34535                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34536                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 34537                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34538 00003695 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 34539 00003698 A2[E948]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 34540                                  
 34541 0000369B B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 34542                                  
 34543                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 34544                                  
 34545                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 34546                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34547 0000369D 8A3E[F148]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 34548                                  	
 34549                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34550                                  	; ax = 2
 34551 000036A1 3906[F648]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 34552                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 34553 000036A5 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 34554                                  
 34555 000036A7 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 34556                                  
 34557                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 34558                                  
 34559 000036A9 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 34560                                  
 34561                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 34562                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 34563                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 34564                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 34565                                  
 34566                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 34567                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 34568                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 34569                                  
 34570 000036AB 833E[F448]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 34571 000036B0 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 34572 000036B2 833E[E448]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 34573 000036B7 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 34574                                  
 34575                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 34576                                  
 34577 000036B9 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34578                                  
 34579                                  ;	check for 320K
 34580                                  
 34581                                  not_144m:
 34582 000036BB 833E[E448]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 34583 000036C0 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 34584 000036C2 833E[F448]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34585 000036C7 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 34586                                  
 34587 000036C9 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 34588 000036CB EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 34589                                  
 34590                                  only_one_head:
 34591                                  
 34592                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 34593                                  
 34594 000036CD 803E[E148]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 34595 000036D2 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34596                                  
 34597                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 34598                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 34599                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 34600                                  
 34601 000036D4 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 34602 000036D6 833E[F448]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34603                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34604 000036DB 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 34605                                  
 34606 000036DD B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 34607                                  
 34608                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 34609                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 34610                                  
 34611                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 34612                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34613                                  	; ax = 2
 34614 000036DF 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 34615 000036E0 A2[E948]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 34616                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 34617                                  
 34618                                  got_correct_mediad:
 34619 000036E3 881E[F148]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 34620                                  
 34621                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 34622                                  
 34623 000036E7 A1[E448]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 34624 000036EA F726[F648]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 34625 000036EE F726[F448]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 34626 000036F2 A3[EF48]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 34627 000036F5 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 34628                                  
 34629 000036F6 C3                      	retn

 34635                                  ; procedure : organize
 34636                                  ;
 34637                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34638                                  
 34639                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 34652                                  ;ifndef	MULTI_CONFIG
 34653                                  ;

 34655                                  ;;   because we the case of values in SET commands preserved
 34656                                  ;
 34657                                  ;	call	mapcase
 34658                                  ;endif
 34659                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34660                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 34661                                  	;call	mapcase
 34662                                  
 34663 000036FD 31F6                    	xor	si,si

 35115                                  	; ds = cs
 35116                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 35117                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 35118 000038F0 893E[5603]              	mov	[count],di
 35119 000038F4 893E[5803]              	mov	[org_count],di
 35120 000038F8 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 35121                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 35122 000038FA 8936[5A03]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 35123                                  
 35124                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35125                                  
 35126                                  ; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35127                                  
 35128                                  ;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 35129                                  ;	retn
 35130                                  ;else
 35131                                  
 35132                                  ;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 35133                                  ;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 35134                                  ;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 35135                                  
 35136 000038FE 89F9                    	mov     cx,di
 35137 00003900 E9E300                  	jmp     menu_check
 35138                                  
 35139                                  ;endif
 35140                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35141                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 35142                                  	;retn

 35144                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35145                                  ;
 35146                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 35147                                  ;
 35148                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 35149                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 35150                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 35151                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 35152                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 35153                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 35154                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 35155                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 35156                                  ;
 35157                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35158                                  
 35159                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35160                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 35161                                  
 35162                                  skip_comment:
 35163 00003903 E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 35164                                  
 35165                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35166                                  	; ds = cs	
 35167                                  
 35168 00003905 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 35169                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 35170 0000390A 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 35171                                  
 35172 0000390C 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 35173                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 35174 00003911 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 35175                                  
 35176 00003913 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35177                                  	
 35178 00003916 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 35179                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 35180 0000391A 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 35181                                  
 35182 0000391C 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 35183                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 35184 00003921 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35185                                  
 35186 00003923 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 35187                                  	
 35188 00003927 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 35189                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 35190 0000392B 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 35191                                  skip_cmmt:
 35192 0000392D E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 35193 0000392F 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35194 00003932 46                      	inc	si
 35195 00003933 49                      	dec	cx
 35196 00003934 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 35197 00003936 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35198                                  no_commt:
 35199 00003938 C3                      	retn

 35201                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35202                                  ; (SYSINIT:42C8h)
 35203

 35205                                  ;%if 0

 35209                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35210                                  ;
 35211                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 35212                                  ;
 35213                                  ;   INPUT
 35214                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35215                                  ;
 35216                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35217                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 35218                                  ;
 35219                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35220                                  ;       All
 35221                                  ;
 35222                                  ;   HISTORY
 35223                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35224                                  ;
 35225                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35226                                  
 35227                                  kbd_read:
 35228 00003939 F606[AC47]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 35229 0000393E 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 35230                                  
 35231 00003940 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 35232 00003941 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 35233 00003943 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 35234                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 35235                                  kbd_loop:
 35236 00003945 B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 35237 00003947 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 35238 00003949 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 35239 0000394B B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35240 0000394D CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35241 0000394F A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35242 00003951 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 35243 00003953 A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 35244                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 35245                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35246 00003956 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 35247                                  
 35248 0000395B 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 35249 0000395D 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 35250                                  kbd_loopdone:
 35251 0000395F 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 35252                                  kbd_nodelay:
 35253 00003960 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 35254 00003962 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35255 00003964 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35256 00003966 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35257 00003968 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 35258 0000396A 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 35259 0000396B 43                              inc     bx
 35260                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 35261 0000396C 800E[B047]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35262                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 35263 00003971 B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 35264 00003973 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35265 00003975 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 35266 00003977 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 35267 00003979 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 35268                                  
 35269                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 35270 0000397B 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 35271 0000397E 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 35272                                  	
 35273 00003980 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35274 00003983 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 35275                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 35276 00003985 BA[434C]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 35277 00003988 E8F30B                          call    print
 35278                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 35279 0000398B 800E[B047]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 35280 00003990 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 35281                                  kbd_notf5:
 35282                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 35283 00003992 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 35284 00003995 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 35285                                  
 35286 00003997 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35287 0000399A 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 35288                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 35289 0000399C BA[814C]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 35290 0000399F E8DC0B                          call    print           ;
 35291 000039A2 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 35292 000039A4 881E[B047]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 35293                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 35294 000039A8 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 35295 000039AA CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 35296 000039AC C606[B647]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 35297 000039B1 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 35298 000039B3 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 35299                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 35300 000039B5 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 35301 000039B8 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 35302                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 35303 000039BA E88608                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 35304 000039BD F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 35305 000039BE C3                              retn			;
 35306                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 35307 000039BF F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 35308 000039C0 C3                              retn			;
 35309                                  
 35310                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35311                                  ;
 35312                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 35313                                  ;
 35314                                  ;   INPUT
 35315                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 35316                                  ;
 35317                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35318                                  ;       None
 35319                                  ;
 35320                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35321                                  ;       None
 35322                                  ;
 35323                                  ;   HISTORY
 35324                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35325                                  ;
 35326                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35327                                  
 35328                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 35329                                  
 35330                                  set_numlock:
 35331                                          ; 04/01/2023
 35332                                  	;push	ax
 35333 000039C1 1E                              push    ds
 35334 000039C2 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 35335 000039C4 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 35336 000039C6 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 35337 000039C9 2E3B06[1E4C]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 35338 000039CE 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 35339 000039D0 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 35340 000039D5 EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 35341                                  not_off:
 35342 000039D7 2E3B06[1C4C]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 35343 000039DC F9                              stc
 35344 000039DD 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 35345 000039DF 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 35346                                  set_done:
 35347 000039E4 1F                              pop     ds
 35348                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35349                                  	;pop	ax
 35350 000039E5 C3                              retn
 35351                                  
 35352                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35353                                  
 35354                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35355                                  ;
 35356                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 35357                                  ;
 35358                                  ;   INPUT
 35359                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 35360                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 35361                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35362                                  ;
 35363                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35364                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 35365                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 35366                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 35367                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 35368                                  ;
 35369                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35370                                  ;       All
 35371                                  ;
 35372                                  ;   NOTES
 35373                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 35374                                  ;
 35375                                  ;   HISTORY
 35376                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35377                                  ;
 35378                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35379                                  
 35380                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35381                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 35382                                  
 35383                                  menu_check:
 35384                                  
 35385                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 35386                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 35387                                  
 35388 000039E6 51                              push    cx              ;
 35389 000039E7 56                              push    si              ;
 35390 000039E8 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 35391                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 35392 000039EA E84C07                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35393 000039ED 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 35394 000039EF 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
