 35395 000039F1 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 35396 000039F3 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 35397 000039F4 EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35398                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 35399 000039F6 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35400 000039F8 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 35401 000039FA 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 35402 000039FC 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 35403 000039FE E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 35404 00003A01 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 35405 00003A06 EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35406                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 35407 00003A08 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 35408 00003A0A 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 35409                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 35410 00003A0C E82A07                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 35411                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 35412 00003A0F 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 35413 00003A11 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 35414 00003A13 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 35415 00003A15 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 35416 00003A17 E81F07                          call    get_char        ;
 35417 00003A1A 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 35418 00003A1C 3A06[0B1F]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 35419 00003A20 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 35420 00003A22 800E[AC47]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35421 00003A27 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35422                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 35423 00003A29 3A06[171F]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 35424 00003A2D 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 35425 00003A2F 800E[AC47]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 35426 00003A34 EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35427                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 35428 00003A36 E8DA06                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35429 00003A39 EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 35430                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 35431 00003A3B 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35432 00003A3C 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35433                                  
 35434                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 35435                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 35436                                  
 35437 00003A3D F606[AC47]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35438 00003A42 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 35439                                  ;
 35440                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 35441                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 35442                                  ;
 35443 00003A44 E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 35444 00003A47 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 35445 00003A49 E9F601                          jmp	menu_abort
 35446                                  
 35447                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 35448                                  
 35449                                  menu_search:
 35450 00003A4C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 35451 00003A4E BF[F147]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 35452 00003A51 E81804                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 35453 00003A54 733D                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 35454 00003A56 C606[E947]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 35455 00003A5B E91402                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 35456                                  
 35457                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 35458                                  
 35459                                  menu_color:
 35460 00003A5E 51                              push    cx              ;
 35461 00003A5F 52                              push    dx              ;
 35462 00003A60 BA0700                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 35463 00003A63 E8B206                          call    get_number	; get first number
 35464 00003A66 80E30F                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 35465 00003A69 88DD                            mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 35466                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 35467                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 35468                                  	;and	dl,0F0h         ; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 35469                                          ;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 35470 00003A6B 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023         ;
 35471 00003A6D E84608                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 35472 00003A70 7511                            jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 35473 00003A72 E8A306                          call    get_number	; get next number
 35474 00003A75 80E30F                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 35475 00003A78 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 35476 00003A7A 80E20F                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 35477 00003A7D B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 35478 00003A7F D2E3                            shl     bl,cl           ;
 35479 00003A81 08DA                            or      dl,bl           ;
 35480                                  check_color:                    ;
 35481 00003A83 38F5                            cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 35482 00003A85 7503                            jne	short set_color	; no
 35483 00003A87 80F208                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35484                                  set_color:
 35485 00003A8A 8816[A747]                      mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 35486 00003A8E 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 35487 00003A8F 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35488 00003A90 E9AB00                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 35489                                  
 35490                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 35491                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 35492                                  
 35493                                  menu_found:
 35494 00003A93 C606[B147]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 35495 00003A98 C706[B347]0000                  mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 35496 00003A9E C606[B547]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35497 00003AA3 8026[B047]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 35498                                  
 35499 00003AA8 E86806                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 35500 00003AAB 29D2                            sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 35501                                  
 35502                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 35503                                  
 35504                                  menu_process:
 35505 00003AAD E88906                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35506 00003AB0 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 35507 00003AB2 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35508 00003AB4 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 35509 00003AB6 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 35510 00003AB8 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35511 00003ABA 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 35512 00003ABC 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 35513 00003ABE 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 35514 00003AC0 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 35515 00003AC2 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 35516 00003AC4 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 35517 00003AC6 7496                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 35518 00003AC8 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35519 00003ACA 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 35520 00003ACC 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 35521 00003ACE 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 35522 00003AD0 E8D307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 35523 00003AD3 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 35524 00003AD5 F9                              stc                     ;
 35525 00003AD6 E83607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 35526 00003AD9 EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35527                                  menu_numlock:
 35528 00003ADB E8E3FE                          call    set_numlock
 35529 00003ADE EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35530                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 35531 00003AE0 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 35532                                  
 35533                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 35534                                  
 35535                                  menu_default:
 35536 00003AE2 8936[B347]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 35537 00003AE6 803E[B647]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 35538 00003AEB 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 35539 00003AED E8F905                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 35540 00003AF0 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 35541 00003AF2 E80A06                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 35542 00003AF5 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 35543 00003AF7 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 35544 00003AF9 E81C06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 35545 00003AFC 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 35546                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 35547 00003AFF 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 35548 00003B01 B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 35549                                  timeout_ok:                    ;
 35550 00003B03 881E[B547]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 35551                                  timeout_skip:
 35552 00003B07 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35553                                  
 35554                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 35555                                  
 35556                                  menu_item:
 35557                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 35558 00003B09 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 35559 00003B0C 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 35560 00003B0E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 35561 00003B10 E84003                          call    srch_block      ;
 35562 00003B13 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 35563 00003B15 F9                              stc                     ;
 35564 00003B16 E8F606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 35565 00003B19 EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 35566                                  
 35567                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 35568                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 35569                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 35570                                  
 35571                                  menu_itemfound:
 35572 00003B1B 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 35573 00003B1C 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 35574 00003B1E 8887[B747]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 35575 00003B22 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 35576                                  
 35577                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 35578                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 35579                                  ;   description...
 35580                                  
 35581 00003B24 89B7[C147]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 35582 00003B28 89B7[D547]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 35583 00003B2C 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 35584 00003B2E E8B805                          call    skip_token      ;
 35585 00003B31 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35586 00003B33 E8C905                          call    skip_delim      ;
 35587 00003B36 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35588 00003B38 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 35589 00003B3A 89BF[D547]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 35590                                  
 35591                                  menu_nextitem:
 35592 00003B3E E8D205                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35593 00003B41 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 35594                                  
 35595                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 35596                                  
 35597                                  menu_getdefault:
 35598 00003B44 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 35599 00003B46 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 35600 00003B48 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 35601 00003B4A E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 35602                                  menu_valid:
 35603 00003B4D 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 35604 00003B4F 8816[B247]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 35605 00003B53 8B3E[B347]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 35606 00003B57 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 35607 00003B59 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 35608 00003B5B 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 35609                                  menu_chkdefault:
 35610 00003B5C 53                              push    bx              ;
 35611 00003B5D 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 35612 00003B5F 8BB7[C147]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35613 00003B63 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 35614 00003B66 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35615 00003B67 06                              push    es              ;
 35616 00003B68 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35617 00003B69 E82703                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 35618 00003B6C 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35619 00003B6D 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35620 00003B6E 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 35621 00003B70 43                              inc     bx              ;
 35622 00003B71 3A1E[B247]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 35623 00003B75 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 35624                                  menu_nodefault:
 35625 00003B77 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 35626                                  menu_setdefault:
 35627 00003B79 881E[B147]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 35628                                  
 35629                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 35630                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 35631                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 35632                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 35633                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 35634                                  ;   with no timeout)
 35635                                  
 35636 00003B7D 803E[B547]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 35637 00003B82 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 35638 00003B84 F606[B047]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 35639 00003B89 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 35640 00003B8B E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 35641                                  
 35642                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 35643                                  
 35644                                  menu_display:
 35645 00003B8E B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 35646 00003B90 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35647 00003B92 B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 35648 00003B94 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35649 00003B96 06                              push    es              ;
 35650 00003B97 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 35651 00003B9A 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 35652 00003B9C 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 35653 00003BA0 A3[AE47]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 35654 00003BA3 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 35655 00003BA7 A2[AD47]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 35656 00003BAA A1[A847]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 35657 00003BAD CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35658 00003BAF B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 35659 00003BB2 8A3E[A747]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 35660 00003BB6 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 35661                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 35662 00003BB8 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 35663 00003BBD FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 35664                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 35665 00003BBF 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 35666 00003BC4 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 35667 00003BC6 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 35668 00003BC8 8A36[AB47]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 35669                                  menu_clear:
 35670 00003BCC CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 35671 00003BCE 07                              pop     es              ;
 35672 00003BCF 8836[AB47]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 35673 00003BD3 BA[BE4C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 35674 00003BD6 E8A509                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 35675                                  
 35676 00003BD9 F606[AC47]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35677 00003BDE 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 35678 00003BE0 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35679 00003BE4 8A36[AB47]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 35680 00003BE8 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 35681 00003BEA B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 35682 00003BEC CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35683 00003BEE BA[0A4D]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 35684 00003BF1 E88A09                          call    print           ;
 35685 00003BF4 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 35686 00003BF6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35687 00003BF8 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 35688 00003BFB 8816[AA47]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 35689                                  
 35690                                  menu_nostatus:
 35691 00003BFF BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 35692                                  menu_disploop:
 35693 00003C02 E8BD02                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 35694 00003C05 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 35695 00003C06 3A1E[B247]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 35696 00003C0A 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 35697                                  
 35698                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 35699                                  
 35700 00003C0C B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 35701 00003C0E 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 35702 00003C10 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 35703 00003C13 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35704 00003C17 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 35705 00003C19 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35706                                  
 35707 00003C1B BA[F74C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 35708 00003C1E E85D09                          call    print           ;
 35709 00003C21 E83603                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 35710 00003C24 BA[CA4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 35711 00003C27 E85409                          call    print           ;
 35712 00003C2A FF36[AC47]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 35713 00003C2E 800E[AC47]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35714 00003C33 E87404                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 35715 00003C36 8F06[AC47]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 35716                                  
 35717                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 35718                                  
 35719                                  menu_autoselect:
 35720 00003C3A 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 35721 00003C3D 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 35722 00003C3F E80106                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 35723                                  menu_abort:
 35724 00003C42 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 35725 00003C44 E9EE00                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 35726                                  
 35727                                  normal_boot:
 35728 00003C47 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 35729 00003C4A 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 35730 00003C4C 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 35731 00003C50 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 35732 00003C52 E9F7FD                          jmp     menu_search
 35733                                  
 35734                                  not_topmenu:
 35735 00003C55 80BF[B747]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35736 00003C5A 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 35737 00003C5C 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 35738 00003C5E 8BBF[C147]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35739 00003C62 E8EE01                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 35740 00003C65 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 35741 00003C67 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 35742 00003C69 E927FE                          jmp     menu_found
 35743                                  
 35744                                  not_submenu:
 35745 00003C6C 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 35746 00003C6E 8B9F[C147]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35747                                  
 35748                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 35749                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 35750                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 35751                                  
 35752                                  no_selection:
 35753 00003C72 891E[B347]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 35754 00003C76 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 35755 00003C7A 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 35756 00003C7C 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35757 00003C7D 8E1E[DD14]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 35758 00003C81 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 35759                                  
 35760                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 35761                                  ;
 35762                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 35763                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 35764                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 35765                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 35766                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 35767                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 35768                                  ;
 35769                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 35770                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 35771                                  
 35772                                  copyblock_loop:
 35773 00003C83 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 35774 00003C84 E83C01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 35775 00003C87 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35776 00003C88 723C                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35777                                  
 35778                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 35779                                  
 35780                                  copyblock_begin:
 35781 00003C8A 50                              push    ax              ;
 35782 00003C8B 51                              push    cx              ;
 35783 00003C8C 56                              push    si              ;
 35784 00003C8D 57                              push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 35785 00003C8E BF[F647]                        mov     di,szCommon
 35786 00003C91 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35787 00003C92 0E                              push    cs              ;
 35788 00003C93 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35789 00003C94 E8FC01                          call    comp_names      ;
 35790 00003C97 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35791 00003C98 5F                              pop     di              ;
 35792 00003C99 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35793 00003C9A 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35794 00003C9B 58                              pop     ax              ;
 35795 00003C9C 740F                            je	short copyblock_check
 35796 00003C9E 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 35797 00003CA0 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 35798 00003CA2 57                              push    di              ;
 35799 00003CA3 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 35800 00003CA5 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35801 00003CA6 06                              push    es              ;
 35802 00003CA7 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35803 00003CA8 E8E801                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 35804 00003CAB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35805 00003CAC 5F                              pop     di              ;
 35806                                  copyblock_check:
 35807 00003CAD 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35808 00003CAF 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 35809 00003CB1 E85F04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35810 00003CB4 EBCD                            jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 35811                                  
 35812                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 35813 00003CB6 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 35814 00003CB9 E87D04                          call    get_char        ;
 35815 00003CBC 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35816 00003CBE 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35817 00003CC0 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 35818 00003CC2 74C6                            je	short copyblock_begin
 35819 00003CC4 EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 35820                                  ;
 35821                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 35822                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 35823                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 35824                                  ;
 35825                                  move_config:
 35826 00003CC6 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 35827 00003CC8 51                              push    cx              ;
 35828                                  ;
 35829                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 35830                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 35831                                  ;
 35832                                   	;mov	cx,7
 35833 00003CC9 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 35834 00003CCC BE[E947]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 35835 00003CCF 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 35836                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 35837                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 35838                                  copy_boot: 
 35839                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 35840 00003CD0 2E                              cs
 35841 00003CD1 AC                      	lodsb
 35842 00003CD2 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 35843 00003CD4 47                              inc     di              ;
 35844 00003CD5 E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 35845                                  
 35846 00003CD7 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 35847                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 35848                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35849 00003CD8 B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 35850 00003CDA 2E8B36[B347]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 35851 00003CDF 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 35852 00003CE1 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 35853 00003CE3 0E                              push    cs              ;
 35854 00003CE4 07                              pop     es              ;
 35855 00003CE5 BE[F647]                        mov     si,szCommon
 35856 00003CE8 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 35857 00003CEB E8B805                          call    any_delim       ;
 35858 00003CEE 7406                            je	short l2	;
 35859 00003CF0 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 35860 00003CF2 46                              inc     si              ;
 35861 00003CF3 47                              inc     di              ;
 35862 00003CF4 E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 35863 00003CF6 C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 35864 00003CF9 07                              pop     es              ;
 35865                                  
 35866                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 35867                                  
 35868 00003CFA 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 35869 00003CFC 2E893E[DB14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35870 00003D01 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 35871 00003D03 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 35872                                  
 35873 00003D04 51                              push    cx              ;
 35874 00003D05 F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 35875 00003D07 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35876 00003D08 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 35877 00003D0A 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35878                                  
 35879                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 35880                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 35881                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 35882                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 35883                                  ;   is empty.
 35884                                  
 35885 00003D0B 06                              push    es              ;
 35886 00003D0C 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 35887 00003D0E 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 35888 00003D0F 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 35889 00003D15 E82800                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35890 00003D18 07                              pop     es
 35891                                  
 35892                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 35893                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 35894                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 35895                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 35896                                  
 35897                                  menu_done:
 35898 00003D19 803E[A847]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 35899 00003D1E 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 35900 00003D20 06                              push    es              ;
 35901 00003D21 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 35902 00003D24 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 35903 00003D26 A1[AE47]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 35904 00003D29 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 35905 00003D2D A0[AD47]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 35906 00003D30 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 35907 00003D34 07                              pop     es              ;
 35908                                  menu_exit:
 35909 00003D35 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 35910 00003D39 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 35911 00003D3D 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 35912 00003D3F C3                              retn
 35913                                  
 35914                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35915                                  ;
 35916                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35917                                  ;
 35918                                  ;   INPUT
 35919                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 35920                                  ;
 35921                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35922                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 35923                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 35924                                  ;
 35925                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35926                                  ;       None
 35927                                  ;
 35928                                  ;   NOTES
 35929                                  ;       None
 35930                                  ;
 35931                                  ;   HISTORY
 35932                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35933                                  ;
 35934                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35935                                  
 35936                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35937                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 35938                                  
 35939                                  copy_envvar:
 35940 00003D40 51                              push    cx              ;
 35941 00003D41 56                              push    si              ;
 35942 00003D42 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35943 00003D43 06                              push    es              ;
 35944 00003D44 06                              push    es              ;
 35945 00003D45 8E06[DD14]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 35946 00003D49 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 35947                                  
 35948                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 35949                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 35950                                  ;   config.sys line)
 35951                                  ;
 35952                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 35953                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 35954                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 35955                                  
 35956 00003D4A 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 35957                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 35958 00003D4C AC                              lodsb                   ;
 35959 00003D4D 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 35960 00003D4F F9                              stc                     ;
 35961 00003D50 746C                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 35962 00003D52 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr          ;
 35963 00003D54 F9                              stc                     ;
 35964 00003D55 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 35965 00003D57 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf          ;
 35966 00003D59 F9                              stc                     ;
 35967 00003D5A 7462                            je	short copy_envexit
 35968 00003D5C 41                              inc     cx              ;
 35969 00003D5D 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 35970 00003D5F 75EB                            jne	short copy_varlen
 35971 00003D61 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 35972 00003D63 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 35973 00003D65 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 35974 00003D67 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 35975 00003D68 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 35976                                  copy_varsrch:
 35977 00003D6A 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 35978 00003D6D 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 35979 00003D6F 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 35980 00003D71 51                              push    cx              ;
 35981 00003D72 56                              push    si              ;
 35982 00003D73 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 35983 00003D75 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35984 00003D76 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35985 00003D77 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 35986 00003D79 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 35987 00003D7D 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 35988                                  
 35989                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 35990                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 35991                                  
 35992 00003D7F B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35993 00003D82 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 35994 00003D84 56                              push    si              ;
 35995 00003D85 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 35996 00003D87 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 35997 00003D89 2E8B0E[DB14]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 35998 00003D8E 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 35999                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 36000                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 36001                                  
 36002 00003D90 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 36003 00003D91 26                      	es	; 26h
 36004 00003D92 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 36005                                  
 36006 00003D93 5E                      	pop     si
 36007                                  copy_envprep:
 36008 00003D94 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 36009 00003D97 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 36010 00003D99 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 36011 00003D9C 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 36012                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 36013                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36014                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 36015 00003D9E AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 36016 00003D9F 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36017 00003DA1 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36018 00003DA3 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36019 00003DA5 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36020 00003DA7 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 36021 00003DA8 EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36022                                  
 36023                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 36024 00003DAA 51                              push    cx              ;
 36025 00003DAB B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36026 00003DAE F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 36027 00003DB0 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36028 00003DB1 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 36029                                  
 36030                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36031                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 36032                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 36033                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36034                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36035                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36036                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36037                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 36038                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36039                                  
 36040                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 36041 00003DB3 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 36042 00003DB5 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 36043                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 36044 00003DB6 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 36045 00003DB9 2E893E[DB14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36046                                  
 36047                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 36048 00003DBE 07                              pop     es              ;
 36049 00003DBF 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36050 00003DC0 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36051 00003DC1 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36052                                  
 36053                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36054 00003DC2 C3                              retn
 36055                                  
 36056                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36057                                  ;
 36058                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 36059                                  ;
 36060                                  ;   INPUT
 36061                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36062                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36063                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 36064                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 36065                                  ;
 36066                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36067                                  ;       Same as above
 36068                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 36069                                  ;
 36070                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36071                                  ;       All
 36072                                  ;
 36073                                  ;   NOTES
 36074                                  ;       None
 36075                                  ;
 36076                                  ;   HISTORY
 36077                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36078                                  ;
 36079                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36080                                  
 36081                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36082                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 36083                                  
 36084                                  copy_block:
 36085 00003DC3 E87303                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 36086 00003DC6 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 36087 00003DC8 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36088 00003DCA 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 36089 00003DCC 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 36090                                  
 36091 00003DCE 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 36092 00003DD0 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 36093 00003DD2 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 36094                                  
 36095                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 36096                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 36097                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 36098                                  
 36099 00003DD4 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 36100 00003DD9 57                              push    di              ;
 36101                                  
 36102 00003DDA BF[F147]                        mov     di,szMenu
 36103 00003DDD E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 36104 00003DE0 7425                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36105                                  
 36106 00003DE2 BF[F647]                        mov     di,szCommon
 36107 00003DE5 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 36108 00003DE8 741D                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36109                                  
 36110 00003DEA 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 36111 00003DEC E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 36112 00003DEF 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 36113 00003DF1 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36114 00003DF2 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 36115 00003DF4 51                              push    cx              ;
 36116 00003DF5 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 36117 00003DF7 56                              push    si              ;
 36118 00003DF8 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 36119 00003DF9 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 36120 00003DFB E81003                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 36121 00003DFE E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 36122 00003E01 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36123 00003E02 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36124 00003E03 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 36125 00003E05 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36126                                  
 36127                                  copy_skip:
 36128 00003E07 5F                              pop     di
 36129                                  copy_error:
 36130 00003E08 F8                              clc                     ;
 36131 00003E09 E80304                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 36132 00003E0C EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36133                                  
 36134                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 36135                                  
 36136                                  copy_line:
 36137 00003E0E 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36138 00003E10 47                              inc     di              ;
 36139 00003E11 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 36140 00003E13 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 36141 00003E15 2E803E[E014]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 36142 00003E1B 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 36143 00003E1D E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 36144 00003E20 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 36145 00003E22 47                              inc     di              ;
 36146 00003E23 47                              inc     di              ;
 36147 00003E24 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 36148                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 36149 00003E26 E81003                          call    get_char        ;
 36150 00003E29 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 36151 00003E2B 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36152 00003E2D 47                              inc     di              ;
 36153                                  copy_next:
 36154 00003E2E 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 36155 00003E30 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 36156                                  
 36157                                  copy_nextline:
 36158 00003E32 E8DE02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36159 00003E35 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 36160                                  
 36161                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36162                                  ;copy_done:
 36163                                          ;retn
 36164                                  
 36165                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36166                                  ;
 36167                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 36168                                  ;
 36169                                  ;   INPUT
 36170                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 36171                                  ;
 36172                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36173                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 36174                                  ;
 36175                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36176                                  ;       DX
 36177                                  ;
 36178                                  ;   NOTES
 36179                                  ;       None
 36180                                  ;
 36181                                  ;   HISTORY
 36182                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36183                                  ;
 36184                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36185                                  
 36186                                  get_linenum:
 36187 00003E37 50                              push    ax              ;
 36188 00003E38 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 36189 00003E3A 51                              push    cx              ;
 36190 00003E3B 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 36191 00003E3D 56                              push    si              ;
 36192 00003E3E 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36193 00003E43 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 36194                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 36195 00003E45 E8C602                          call    skip_line       ;
 36196 00003E48 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 36197 00003E4A 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36198 00003E4B 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 36199 00003E4D 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 36200                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 36201 00003E4F 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36202 00003E50 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36203 00003E51 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36204 00003E52 C3                              retn
 36205                                  
 36206                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36207                                  ;
 36208                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 36209                                  ;
 36210                                  ;   INPUT
 36211                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 36212                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 36213                                  ;
 36214                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36215                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 36216                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 36217                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 36218                                  ;
 36219                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36220                                  ;       None
 36221                                  ;
 36222                                  ;   NOTES
 36223                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 36224                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 36225                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 36226                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 36227                                  ;
 36228                                  ;   HISTORY
 36229                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36230                                  ;
 36231                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36232                                  
 36233                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 36234 00003E53 50                              push    ax              ;
 36235 00003E54 51                              push    cx              ;
 36236 00003E55 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36237 00003E5A 56                              push    si              ;
 36238 00003E5B 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36239 00003E5D 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36240 00003E5E 06                              push    es              ;
 36241 00003E5F 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36242 00003E60 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 36243 00003E63 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 36244 00003E65 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 36245 00003E67 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36246 00003E68 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36247 00003E69 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36248 00003E6A 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36249                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 36250 00003E6B C3                              retn			;
 36251                                  
 36252                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36253                                  ;
 36254                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 36255                                  ;
 36256                                  ;   INPUT
 36257                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 36258                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 36259                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 36260                                  ;
 36261                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36262                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 36263                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36264                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36265                                  ;
 36266                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36267                                  ;       AX
 36268                                  ;
 36269                                  ;   NOTES
 36270                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 36271                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 36272                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 36273                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 36274                                  ;
 36275                                  ;   HISTORY
 36276                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36277                                  ;
 36278                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36279                                  
 36280                                  find_block:
 36281 00003E6C E8CA02                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 36282 00003E6F 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 36283 00003E71 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 36284 00003E73 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 36285 00003E75 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 36286 00003E77 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 36287 00003E79 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 36288 00003E7B 2E800E[E014]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36289 00003E81 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 36290                                  check_line:
 36291 00003E83 2E800E[E014]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36292 00003E89 E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 36293 00003E8C 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 36294                                  next_line:
 36295 00003E8E E88202                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 36296 00003E91 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 36297                                  ;find_exit:
 36298                                  ;	retn
 36299                                  
 36300                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36301                                  ;
 36302                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 36303                                  ;
 36304                                  ;   INPUT
 36305                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 36306                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36307                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36308                                  ;
 36309                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36310                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 36311                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36312                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36313                                  ;
 36314                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36315                                  ;       AX
 36316                                  ;
 36317                                  ;   NOTES
 36318                                  ;       None
 36319                                  ;
 36320                                  ;   HISTORY
 36321                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36322                                  ;
 36323                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36324                                  
 36325                                  comp_names:
 36326 00003E93 57                              push    di              ;
 36327                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 36328 00003E94 E8A202                          call    get_char        ;
 36329 00003E97 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 36330 00003E99 E80A04                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 36331 00003E9C 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 36332 00003E9E 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 36333 00003EA0 47                              inc     di              ;
 36334 00003EA1 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 36335                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 36336 00003EA4 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 36337 00003EA6 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 36338 00003EA8 F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 36339                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 36340 00003EA9 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36341 00003EAA C3                              retn			;
 36342                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 36343 00003EAB 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 36344 00003EAD E8F603                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 36345 00003EB0 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 36346 00003EB2 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 36347                                  
 36348                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36349                                  
 36350                                  comp_names_safe:
 36351 00003EB4 50                              push    ax
 36352 00003EB5 51                              push    cx
 36353 00003EB6 56                              push	si
 36354 00003EB7 1E                              push    ds
 36355 00003EB8 0E                              push    cs
 36356 00003EB9 1F                              pop     ds
 36357 00003EBA E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 36358 00003EBD 1F                              pop     ds
 36359 00003EBE 5E                      	pop	si
 36360 00003EBF 59                              pop     cx
 36361 00003EC0 58                              pop     ax
 36362 00003EC1 C3                              retn
 36363                                  
 36364                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36365                                  ;
 36366                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 36367                                  ;
 36368                                  ;   INPUT
 36369                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 36370                                  ;
 36371                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36372                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 36373                                  ;
 36374                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36375                                  ;       None
 36376                                  ;
 36377                                  ;   NOTES
 36378                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 36379                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 36380                                  ;
 36381                                  ;   HISTORY
 36382                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36383                                  ;
 36384                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36385                                  
 36386                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36387                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 36388                                  
 36389                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 36390 00003EC2 50                              push    ax              ;
 36391 00003EC3 53                              push    bx              ;
 36392 00003EC4 51                              push    cx              ;
 36393 00003EC5 52                              push    dx              ;
 36394 00003EC6 56                              push    si              ;
 36395 00003EC7 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36396 00003EC9 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 36397 00003ECD CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 36398 00003ECF 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 36399 00003ED0 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36400 00003ED2 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 36401 00003ED4 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 36402 00003ED7 B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 36403 00003ED9 CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 36404 00003EDB 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36405 00003EDD 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 36406 00003EDF 8A26[A747]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 36407 00003EE3 3A1E[B147]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 36408 00003EE7 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 36409 00003EE9 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 36410 00003EEC 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 36411 00003EEE B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 36412 00003EF0 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 36413 00003EF2 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 36414 00003EF4 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 36415 00003EF6 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36416                                  print_other:                    ;
 36417 00003EF9 B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 36418 00003EFB 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36419 00003EFD 8BBF[D547]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 36420 00003F01 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 36421 00003F03 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 36422 00003F07 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 36423 00003F09 B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 36424 00003F0C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36425 00003F0E FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36426 00003F10 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36427 00003F12 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36428                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 36429 00003F14 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
