 36430 00003F17 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 36431 00003F19 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36432 00003F1B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36433 00003F1D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36434                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 36435 00003F1F B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 36436 00003F22 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 36437 00003F24 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36438 00003F26 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36439 00003F28 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36440 00003F2A 06                              push    es              ;
 36441                                  print_loop:                     ;
 36442 00003F2B 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 36443 00003F2E 47                              inc     di              ;
 36444 00003F2F 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 36445 00003F31 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 36446 00003F33 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 36447                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 36448 00003F35 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 36449 00003F37 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 36450 00003F39 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 36451 00003F3B 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 36452 00003F3D B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 36453 00003F3F CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36454 00003F41 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36455 00003F43 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 36456 00003F46 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 36457 00003F48 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36458 00003F4A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36459 00003F4C EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 36460                                  print_done:                     ;
 36461 00003F4E 07                              pop     es              ;
 36462 00003F4F 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 36463 00003F50 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36464 00003F52 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 36465 00003F54 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36466 00003F55 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 36467 00003F56 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36468 00003F57 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36469 00003F58 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36470 00003F59 C3                              retn			;
 36471                                  
 36472                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36473                                  ;
 36474                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 36475                                  ;
 36476                                  ;   INPUT
 36477                                  ;       None
 36478                                  ;
 36479                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36480                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 36481                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 36482                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 36483                                  ;
 36484                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36485                                  ;       None
 36486                                  ;
 36487                                  ;   NOTES
 36488                                  ;       None
 36489                                  ;
 36490                                  ;   HISTORY
 36491                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36492                                  ;
 36493                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36494                                  
 36495                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 36496 00003F5A 8A1E[B147]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 36497 00003F5E 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36498 00003F60 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 36499 00003F63 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 36500 00003F66 803E[B547]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36501 00003F6B 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 36502 00003F6D B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 36503 00003F6F CD21                            int     21h             ;
 36504 00003F71 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 36505                                  check_time:
 36506 00003F73 A0[B547]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 36507 00003F76 2A06[B647]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 36508 00003F7A 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 36509 00003F7C 800E[B047]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 36510 00003F81 C606[B647]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 36511 00003F86 E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 36512                                  show_time:
 36513 00003F89 53                              push    bx              ;
 36514 00003F8A 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 36515 00003F8C 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36516 00003F90 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36517 00003F92 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36518 00003F94 52                              push    dx              ;
 36519 00003F95 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 36520 00003F98 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36521 00003F9A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36522 00003F9C BA[6A4D]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 36523 00003F9F E8DC05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 36524 00003FA2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 36525 00003FA4 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 36526 00003FA5 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 36527 00003FA7 F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 36528 00003FA9 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 36529 00003FAB 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 36530 00003FAD B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36531 00003FAF CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 36532 00003FB1 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 36533 00003FB3 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 36534 00003FB5 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36535 00003FB7 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 36536 00003FB9 5A                              pop     dx
 36537 00003FBA B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 36538 00003FBC CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36539 00003FBE 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36540                                  input_key:
 36541 00003FBF B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 36542 00003FC1 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 36543 00003FC3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 36544 00003FC5 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 36545 00003FC7 803E[B547]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 36546 00003FCC 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 36547 00003FCE B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 36548 00003FD0 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 36549 00003FD2 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 36550 00003FD4 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 36551 00003FD6 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 36552 00003FD8 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 36553 00003FDA B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 36554                                  got_time:
 36555 00003FDC 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 36556 00003FDE 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 36557 00003FE0 0036[B647]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 36558 00003FE4 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 36559                                  got_key:
 36560 00003FE6 50                              push    ax              ;
 36561 00003FE7 B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 36562 00003FEA 8706[B547]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 36563 00003FEE 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 36564 00003FF0 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 36565 00003FF2 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 36566 00003FF3 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36567 00003FF6 8B1E[A747]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36568 00003FFA B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 36569 00003FFD CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 36570 00003FFF 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 36571                                  
 36572                                  timeout_disabled:
 36573 00004000 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36574 00004001 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 36575 00004003 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 36576 00004005 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 36577 00004007 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 36578                                  
 36579 00004009 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 36580 0000400B 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 36581 0000400D 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 36582 00004010 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 36583 00004012 FE0E[B147]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36584 00004016 E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36585 00004019 FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 36586 0000401B EB12                            jmp     short print1
 36587                                  not_up:
 36588 0000401D 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 36589 0000401F 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 36590 00004021 3A1E[B247]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 36591 00004025 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 36592 00004027 FE06[B147]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36593 0000402B E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36594 0000402E 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 36595                                  print1: 
 36596 0000402F 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 36597                                  print2: 
 36598 00004031 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 36599 00004034 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 36600                                  to_input_key:
 36601 00004037 EB86                            jmp     input_key       ;
 36602                                  not_down:
 36603 00004039 F606[AC47]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36604 0000403E 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 36605 00004040 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36606 00004042 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 36607 00004044 8036[B047]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36608 00004049 E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 36609 0000404C E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 36610                                  not_f8:
 36611 0000404F 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36612 00004051 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 36613                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 36614                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 36615                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 36616 00004053 800E[B047]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 36617 00004058 BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 36618 0000405B B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 36619 0000405D EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 36620                                  
 36621                                  normal_key:
 36622 0000405F 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 36623 00004061 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 36624 00004063 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 36625 00004065 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 36626 00004067 BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 36627 0000406A C3                              retn			;
 36628                                  not_backspace:
 36629 0000406B 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 36630 0000406D 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 36631 0000406F 3A06[B247]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 36632 00004073 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 36633 00004075 A2[B147]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 36634 00004078 E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 36635 0000407B 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 36636 0000407D EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 36637                                  
 36638                                  select_done:
 36639 0000407F B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 36640 00004081 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36641 00004083 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 36642                                  
 36643                                  	; fall into disp_input
 36644                                  
 36645                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36646                                  
 36647                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36648                                  ;
 36649                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 36650                                  ;
 36651                                  ;   INPUT
 36652                                  ;       AL == character to display
 36653                                  ;
 36654                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36655                                  ;       None
 36656                                  ;
 36657                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36658                                  ;       None
 36659                                  ;
 36660                                  ;   NOTES
 36661                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 36662                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 36663                                  ;
 36664                                  ;   HISTORY
 36665                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36666                                  ;
 36667                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36668                                  
 36669                                  disp_input:
 36670 00004085 50                              push    ax
 36671 00004086 3C20                            cmp     al,' '
 36672 00004088 7302                            jae	short disp_ok
 36673 0000408A B020                            mov     al,' '
 36674                                  disp_ok:
 36675 0000408C 88C2                            mov     dl,al
 36676 0000408E B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36677 00004090 CD21                            int     21h
 36678 00004092 BA[CA4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm
 36679 00004095 E8E604                          call    print
 36680 00004098 58                              pop     ax
 36681 00004099 C3                              retn
 36682                                  
 36683                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36684                                  
 36685                                  disp_num:
 36686 0000409A 53                              push    bx
 36687 0000409B 0430                            add     al,'0'
 36688 0000409D B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 36689 0000409F 8B1E[A747]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36690 000040A3 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 36691 000040A6 CD10                            int     10h
 36692 000040A8 5B                              pop     bx
 36693 000040A9 C3                              retn
 36694                                  
 36695                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36696                                  ;
 36697                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 36698                                  ;
 36699                                  ;   INPUT
 36700                                  ;       None
 36701                                  ;
 36702                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36703                                  ;       None
 36704                                  ;
 36705                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36706                                  ;       None
 36707                                  ;
 36708                                  ;   NOTES
 36709                                  ;       None
 36710                                  ;
 36711                                  ;   HISTORY
 36712                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36713                                  ;
 36714                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36715                                  
 36716                                  show_status:
 36717 000040AA 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 36718 000040AB 8B1E[A747]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36719 000040AF B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36720 000040B1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36721 000040B3 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 36722 000040B4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36723 000040B6 8B16[AA47]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 36724 000040BA F606[AC47]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36725 000040BF 740E                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 36726 000040C1 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 36727 000040C3 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36728 000040C5 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36729 000040C8 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 36730 000040CB CD10                            int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 36731 000040CD EB13                            jmp     short show_done ;
 36732                                  show_onoff: 
 36733 000040CF CD10                            int     10h
 36734                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 36735                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 36736                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 36737                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 36738                                  
 36739 000040D1 A0[664D]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 36740 000040D4 803E[B047]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 36741 000040D9 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 36742 000040DB A0[624D]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 36743                                  show_noton:                     ;
 36744 000040DE B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 36745 000040E0 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36746                                  show_done:                      ;
 36747 000040E2 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 36748 000040E3 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36749 000040E5 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 36750 000040E7 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36751 000040E8 C3                              retn			;
 36752                                  
 36753                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36754                                  
 36755                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36756                                  ;
 36757                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 36758                                  ;
 36759                                  ;   INPUT
 36760                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36761                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36762                                  ;
 36763                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36764                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 36765                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 36766                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 36767                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36768                                  ;
 36769                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36770                                  ;       AX
 36771                                  ;
 36772                                  ;   NOTES
 36773                                  ;       None
 36774                                  ;
 36775                                  ;   HISTORY
 36776                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36777                                  ;
 36778                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36779                                  
 36780                                  skip_token:
 36781 000040E9 E84D00                          call    get_char
 36782 000040EC 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 36783 000040EE E8B501                          call    any_delim
 36784 000040F1 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 36785                                  skip_check_eol:
 36786 000040F3 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 36787 000040F5 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 36788 000040F7 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36789 000040F9 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 36790 000040FB F8                              clc
 36791                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 36792 000040FC C3                      	retn
 36793                                  skip_token_eol:
 36794 000040FD F9                              stc
 36795                                  skip_token_done:
 36796 000040FE C3                              retn
 36797                                  
 36798                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36799                                  ;
 36800                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 36801                                  ;
 36802                                  ;   INPUT
 36803                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36804                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36805                                  ;
 36806                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36807                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36808                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 36809                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 36810                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36811                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 36812                                  ;
 36813                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36814                                  ;       AX
 36815                                  ;
 36816                                  ;   NOTES
 36817                                  ;       None
 36818                                  ;
 36819                                  ;   HISTORY
 36820                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36821                                  ;
 36822                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36823                                  
 36824                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 36825 000040FF E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 36826 00004102 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 36827 00004105 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 36828 00004107 E8AC01                          call    delim           ;
 36829 0000410A 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 36830 0000410C EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 36831                                  
 36832                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36833                                  ;
 36834                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 36835                                  ;
 36836                                  ;   INPUT
 36837                                  ;       AL == last character read
 36838                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36839                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36840                                  ;
 36841                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36842                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36843                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 36844                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36845                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36846                                  ;
 36847                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36848                                  ;       AX
 36849                                  ;
 36850                                  ;   NOTES
 36851                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 36852                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 36853                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 36854                                  ;
 36855                                  ;   HISTORY
 36856                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36857                                  ;
 36858                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36859                                  
 36860                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 36861                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 36862                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36863                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 36864                                       
 36865                                  	; fall into skip_line
 36866                                  
 36867                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36868                                  ;
 36869                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 36870                                  ;
 36871                                  ;   INPUT
 36872                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36873                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36874                                  ;
 36875                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36876                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36877                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36878                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36879                                  ;
 36880                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36881                                  ;       AX
 36882                                  ;
 36883                                  ;   NOTES
 36884                                  ;       None
 36885                                  ;
 36886                                  ;   HISTORY
 36887                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36888                                  ;
 36889                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36890                                  
 36891                                  skip_line:
 36892 0000410E E82800                          call    get_char
 36893 00004111 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 36894                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 36895 00004113 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36896 00004115 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 36897                                  skip_line_done:
 36898                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36899 00004117 C3                              retn
 36900                                  
 36901                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36902                                  ;
 36903                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 36904                                  ;
 36905                                  ;   INPUT
 36906                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36907                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36908                                  ;
 36909                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36910                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 36911                                  ;       BX == binary #
 36912                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 36913                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36914                                  ;
 36915                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36916                                  ;       AX
 36917                                  ;
 36918                                  ;   NOTES
 36919                                  ;       None
 36920                                  ;
 36921                                  ;   HISTORY
 36922                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36923                                  ;
 36924                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36925                                  
 36926                                  ; 13/05/2019
 36927                                  
 36928                                  get_number:
 36929 00004118 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 36930                                  num_loop:
 36931 0000411A E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 36932 0000411D 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 36933 0000411F 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 36934 00004121 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 36935 00004123 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 36936 00004125 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 36937 00004127 50                              push    ax              ;
 36938 00004128 B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 36939 0000412B 52                              push    dx              ;
 36940 0000412C F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 36941 0000412E 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 36942 0000412F 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 36943 00004131 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36944 00004132 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 36945 00004134 98                              cbw                     ;
 36946 00004135 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 36947 00004137 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 36948                                  
 36949                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36950                                  ;num_done:
 36951                                          ;retn
 36952                                  
 36953                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36954                                  ;
 36955                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 36956                                  ;
 36957                                  ;   INPUT
 36958                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36959                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36960                                  ;
 36961                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36962                                  ;       AL == next character
 36963                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36964                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36965                                  ;
 36966                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36967                                  ;       AX
 36968                                  ;
 36969                                  ;   NOTES
 36970                                  ;       None
 36971                                  ;
 36972                                  ;   HISTORY
 36973                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36974                                  ;
 36975                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36976                                  
 36977                                  get_char:
 36978 00004139 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36979 0000413C 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36980                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36981 0000413E 26                      	es	
 36982 0000413F AC                      	lodsb
 36983 00004140 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 36984 00004142 C3                              retn			;
 36985                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36986 00004143 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36987                                  nearby_ret:
 36988 00004146 C3                              retn
 36989                                  
 36990                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36991                                  ;
 36992                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36993                                  ;
 36994                                  ;   INPUT
 36995                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36996                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36997                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36998                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36999                                  ;
 37000                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37001                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 37002                                  ;
 37003                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37004                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 37005                                  ;
 37006                                  ;   NOTES
 37007                                  ;       None
 37008                                  ;
 37009                                  ;   HISTORY
 37010                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37011                                  ;
 37012                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37013                                  
 37014                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37015                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 37016                                  
 37017                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37018                                  query_user:
 37019 00004147 F606[B047]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 37020                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37021 0000414C 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 37022 0000414E E9BA00                  	jmp	skip_all
 37023                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37024                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 37025                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 37026                                  qu_1:
 37027 00004151 F606[B047]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 37028 00004156 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 37029 00004158 50                              push    ax                      ;
 37030 00004159 A0[DF14]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 37031 0000415C F606[B047]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 37032 00004161 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 37033 00004163 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 37034                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37035 00004165 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 37036                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37037                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 37038                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 37039                                  
 37040                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37041 00004167 58                      	pop	ax
 37042 00004168 C3                      	retn
 37043                                  
 37044                                  query_all:
 37045                                  
 37046                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 37047                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 37048                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 37049                                  
 37050 00004169 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37051 0000416A BA[BC4D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 37052 0000416D 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37053 0000416F 7451                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 37054                                  
 37055 00004171 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 37056 00004173 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 37057 00004175 BF[FD47]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 37058                                  find_match:                             ;
 37059 00004178 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 37060 0000417A 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 37061 0000417C 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 37062 0000417E 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37063 0000417F 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 37064 00004181 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 37065 00004183 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 37066                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 37067 00004186 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 37068                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 37069 00004188 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 37070 0000418B B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 37071 0000418D B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37072                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 37073 0000418F 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 37074 00004191 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37075 00004192 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37076 00004194 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37077 00004196 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 37078 00004198 B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 37079 0000419A 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 37080 0000419D 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 37081 0000419F B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 37082                                  cmd_notset:
 37083 000041A1 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 37084                                  line_print:                             ;
 37085                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 37086 000041A3 26                              es
 37087 000041A4 AC                      	lodsb
 37088 000041A5 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 37089 000041A7 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 37090 000041A9 B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 37091                                  non_null:                               ;
 37092 000041AB 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 37093 000041AD 7210                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 37094 000041AF 7506                            jne	short non_space		;
 37095 000041B1 26803C20                        cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 37096 000041B5 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 37097                                  non_space:                              ;
 37098 000041B7 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37099 000041B9 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 37100 000041BB CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37101 000041BD EBE4                            jmp	short line_print	;
 37102                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 37103 000041BF BA[5A4D]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 37104                                  
 37105                                  generic_prompt:
 37106 000041C2 E8B903                          call    print                   ;
 37107                                  input_loop:                             ;
 37108 000041C5 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 37109 000041C7 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 37110 000041C9 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 37111 000041CB 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 37112 000041CD 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 37113 000041D0 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 37114 000041D2 A0[664D]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 37115 000041D5 800E[B047]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 37116 000041DA EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 37117                                  not_func:
 37118 000041DC 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 37119 000041DE 3A06[664D]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 37120 000041E2 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 37121 000041E4 3A06[624D]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 37122 000041E8 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 37123 000041EA 803E[DF14]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 37124 000041EF 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 37125 000041F1 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 37126 000041F3 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 37127 000041F5 800E[B047]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 37128 000041FA A0[624D]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 37129                                  legal_char:                             ;
 37130 000041FD E885FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 37131 00004200 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37132                                  
 37133 00004201 3A06[664D]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 37134 00004205 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 37135                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37136 00004207 F8                      	clc
 37137                                  do_cmd:
 37138 00004208 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37139                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37140                                  	; cf=0
 37141                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 37142 00004209 C3                      	retn
 37143                                  
 37144                                  skip_cmd:
 37145 0000420A 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37146                                  skip_all:
 37147 0000420B B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 37148 0000420D F9                      	stc
 37149 0000420E C3                      	retn

 37206                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37207                                  
 37208                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 37209                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 37210                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 37211                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 37212                                  
 37213                                  disable_autoexec:
 37214                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 37215                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37216                                  
 37217 00004243 F606[B047]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 37218 00004248 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 37219 0000424A F606[A647]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 37220 0000424F 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 37221 00004251 800E[A647]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 37222                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 37223 00004256 810E[B047]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 37224 0000425C BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 37225                                  dae_1:
 37226                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37227 0000425F A0[E546]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 37228                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 37229 00004262 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 37230 00004264 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 37231 00004266 8A1E[E646]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 37232 0000426A B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 37233 0000426C 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 37234 0000426E 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 37235 00004271 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 37236 00004274 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 37237 00004276 881E[E646]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 37238 0000427A 81C3[E746]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 37239 0000427E 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 37240                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 37241 0000427F 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 37242 00004282 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 37243 00004284 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 37244 00004285 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 37245 00004287 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;

 37247 0000428A 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h

 37249                                  disable_exit:                           ;

 37295                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 37296                                  delim:

 37301 000042BC 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 37302                                  
 37303                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 37304 000042BE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.

 37307 000042C4 740B                    	je	short delim_ret

 37309 000042C8 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 37310 000042CA 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 37311 000042CC 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 37312 000042CE 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'

 37320                                  ;endif

 37346                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 37347                                  ;
 37348                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37349                                  
 37350                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37351                                  
 37352                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37353                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 37354                                  mapcase:

 37356 000042E0 56                      	push	si
 37357 000042E1 1E                      	push	ds
 37358                                  
 37359 000042E2 06                      	push	es
 37360 000042E3 1F                      	pop	ds
 37361                                  
 37362                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37363                                  
 37364                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 37365                                  
 37366                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37367 000042E4 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 37368                                  ;else
 37369                                  ;	xor	si,si
 37370                                  ;endif
 37371                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37372                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 37373                                  	;xor	si, si
 37374                                  
 37375                                  convloop:
 37376 000042E6 AC                      	lodsb
 37377 000042E7 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 37378 000042E9 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 37379 000042EB 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 37380 000042ED 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 37381 000042EF 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 37382 000042F1 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 37383                                  noconv:
 37384                                  
 37385                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37386                                  
 37387                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 37388                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37389                                  
 37390                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 37391                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 37392                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 37393                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 37394                                  ;
 37395 000042F4 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 37396 000042F7 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 37397 000042F9 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 37398 000042FB 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 37399                                  check_eol:
 37400 000042FD 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 37401 000042FF 7406                    	je	short convdone
 37402 00004301 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 37403 00004303 7402                    	je	short convdone
 37404                                  ;endif

 37406 00004305 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 37407                                  convdone:
 37408 00004307 1F                      	pop	ds
 37409 00004308 5E                      	pop	si
 37410 00004309 59                      	pop	cx
 37411 0000430A C3                      	retn

 37421

 37430 0000431F 2EA1[6403]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi

 37432 00004328 7322                    	jae	short mem_err

 37469                                  ; procedure : calldev
 37470                                  ;
 37471                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37472                                  
 37473                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37474                                  	; (SYSINIT:34E0h)
 37475                                  calldev:
 37476 00004357 2E8E1E[B71F]            	mov	ds,[cs:DevEntry+2]
 37477 0000435C 2E031E[B51F]            	add	bx,[cs:DevEntry]	; do a little relocation
 37478 00004361 8B07                    	mov	ax,[bx]
 37479                                  
 37480 00004363 2EFF36[B51F]            	push	word [cs:DevEntry]
 37481 00004368 2EA3[B51F]              	mov	word [cs:DevEntry],ax
 37482 0000436C BB[6A03]                	mov	bx,packet
 37483 0000436F 2EFF1E[B51F]            	call	far [cs:DevEntry]
 37484 00004374 2E8F06[B51F]            	pop	word [cs:DevEntry]
 37485 00004379 C3                      	retn

 37487                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37488                                  ;
 37489                                  ; procedure : todigit
 37490                                  ;
 37491                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37492                                  
 37493                                  todigit:
 37494 0000437A 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 37495                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 37496                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37497 0000437C 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 37498                                  	;cmp	al,9
 37499                                  	;ja	short notdig
 37500                                  	;clc
 37501                                  	;retn
 37502                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37503 0000437E 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 37504 00004380 F5                      	cmc
 37505                                  notdig:
 37506                                  	;stc
 37507                                  notdig2:
 37508 00004381 C3                      	retn
 37509                                  
 37510                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37511                                  ;
 37512                                  ; procedure : getnum
 37513                                  ;
 37514                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 37515                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 37516                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 37517                                  ;
 37518                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37519                                  
 37520                                  getnum:
 37521 00004382 53                      	push	bx
 37522 00004383 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 37523                                  b2:
 37524 00004385 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 37525 00004388 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 37526                                  
 37527 0000438A 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 37528 0000438B 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 37529                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 37530                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37531 0000438C B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 37532 0000438E F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 37533 00004390 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 37534 00004391 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 37535 00004393 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 37536 00004396 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 37537                                  
 37538 00004398 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 37539                                  
 37540 00004399 E8FBE5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 37541 0000439C 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 37542 0000439E 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 37543 000043A0 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 37544 000043A2 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 37545 000043A4 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 37546 000043A6 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 37547 000043A8 7417                    	je	short b15
 37548 000043AA 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 37549 000043AF 7410                    	je	short b15
 37550 000043B1 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 37551                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37552                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37553                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 37554                                  	;nop
 37555 000043B3 740C                    	je	short b15
 37556 000043B5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 37557 000043B7 7408                    	je	short b15
 37558 000043B9 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 37559 000043BB 7404                    	je	short b15
 37560 000043BD 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 37561 000043BF 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 37562                                  b15:
 37563 000043C1 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 37564 000043C6 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 37565                                  b1:
 37566 000043CB 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 37567 000043CD 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 37568 000043CF 5B                      	pop	bx
 37569 000043D0 C3                      	retn
 37570                                  badnum:
 37571                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37572                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 37573 000043D1 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 37574                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 37575 000043D3 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 37576 000043D7 5B                      	pop	bx
 37577 000043D8 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 37578 000043D9 C3                      	retn
 37579                                  
 37580                                  ;****************************************************************************
 37581                                  
 37582                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 37583                                  
 37584                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37585                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 37586                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 37587                                  ;	si = 0
 37588                                  ;	ax = country id
 37589                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 37590                                  ;	bx = file handle
 37591                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 37592                                  ;
 37593                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 37594                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 37595                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 37596                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 37597                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37598                                  
 37599                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37600                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 37601                                  
 37602 000043DA 57                      	push	di
 37603 000043DB 50                      	push	ax
 37604 000043DC 52                      	push	dx
 37605                                  
 37606 000043DD 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 37607 000043DF 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 37608 000043E1 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 37609 000043E4 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 37610 000043E7 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37611                                  
 37612 000043E9 06                      	push	es
 37613 000043EA 56                      	push	si
 37614                                  
 37615 000043EB 0E                      	push	cs
 37616 000043EC 07                      	pop	es
 37617                                  
 37618 000043ED BF[4B46]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 37619 000043F0 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 37620 000043F3 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 37621                                  
 37622 000043F5 5E                      	pop	si
 37623 000043F6 07                      	pop	es
 37624 000043F7 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 37625                                  
 37626 000043F9 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 37627 000043FC 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 37628 000043FF 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 37629                                  
 37630 00004401 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 37631 00004402 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 37632 00004404 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 37633 00004407 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 37634 0000440A E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 37635 0000440D 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37636                                  
 37637 0000440F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 37638 00004411 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 37639 00004415 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37640                                  
 37641 00004417 46                      	inc	si
 37642 00004418 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 37643 00004419 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 37644 0000441A 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 37645 0000441B 5F                      	pop	di
 37646                                  
 37647                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 37648 0000441C 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 37649 0000441F 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 37650                                  
 37651 00004421 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 37652 00004424 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 37653 00004426 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 37654 00004429 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 37655                                  
 37656                                  setdoscntry_next:
 37657 0000442B 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 37658 0000442D 46                      	inc	si
 37659 0000442E 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 37660 0000442F E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 37661                                  
 37662 00004431 B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 37663                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 37664 00004434 F9                      	stc
 37665 00004435 C3                      	retn
 37666                                  
 37667                                  setdosdata_fail:
 37668 00004436 5E                      	pop	si
 37669 00004437 59                      	pop	cx
 37670 00004438 5F                      	pop	di
 37671 00004439 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 37672                                  
 37673                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 37674 0000443B 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 37675                                  
 37676                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 37677 0000443E 2E8916[5346]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 37678 00004443 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 37679 00004446 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 37680 00004449 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 37681 0000444C E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 37682 0000444F 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 37683                                  
 37684 00004451 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 37685 00004453 46                      	inc	si
 37686 00004454 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 37687                                  
 37688                                  setdoscntry_data:
 37689 00004455 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 37690 00004456 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 37691 00004457 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 37692

 37694 0000445B E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di

 37696

 37700 00004469 F9                      	stc
 37701 0000446A CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37702 0000446C 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37703                                  
 37704 0000446E BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 37705 00004471 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 37706 00004474 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 37707 00004476 F9                      	stc
 37708 00004477 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 37709 00004479 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 37710                                  
 37711 0000447B 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 37712 0000447D 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 37713                                  
 37714 0000447F 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 37715 00004482 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 37716 00004485 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37717 00004488 F9                      	stc
 37718 00004489 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 37719 0000448B 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37720                                  
 37721 0000448D 56                      	push	si
 37722 0000448E BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 37723 00004491 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 37724 00004493 5E                      	pop	si
 37725 00004494 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 37726 00004497 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 37727 0000449A B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 37728 0000449C F9                      	stc
 37729 0000449D CD21                    	int	21h
 37730 0000449F 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37731                                  
 37732 000044A1 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 37733 000044A3 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 37734                                  
 37735 000044A5 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 37736 000044A8 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 37737 000044AB 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 37738 000044AD 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 37739 000044AE 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 37740 000044AF 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 37741 000044B3 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37742                                  
 37743                                  	;if	bugfix
 37744 000044B5 E83500                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 37745                                  	;endif
 37746                                  
 37747 000044B8 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 37748 000044BA 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 37749                                  
 37750 000044BC 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 37751                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 37752 000044C0 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 37753                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 37754                                  	
 37755 000044C4 57                      	push	di			;save di
 37756                                  
 37757 000044C5 50                      	push	ax
 37758 000044C6 2EA1[5346]              	mov	ax,[cs:cntrycodepage_id] ;do not use the code page info in country_info
 37759 000044CA 894404                  	mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 37760 000044CD 58                      	pop	ax
 37761                                  
 37762                                  setdoscntry_mov:

 37764 000044D0 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo	;was the ccmono_ptr saved?
