 37769                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 37770 000044D9 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 37771                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 37772                                  
 37773                                  setdoscntry_data_next:
 37774 000044DD 5E                      	pop	si			;restore control buffer pointer
 37775 000044DE 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left
 37776 000044DF 5F                      	pop	di			;restore pointer to dso_country_cdpg
 37777 000044E0 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 37778 000044E2 46                      	inc	si
 37779 000044E3 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 37780 000044E4 49                      	dec	cx
 37781 000044E5 83F900                  	cmp	cx,0
 37782 000044E8 741D                    	je	short setdoscntry_ok
 37783 000044EA E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data
 37784                                  
 37785                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37786                                  ;setdoscntry_ok:
 37787                                  	;retn

 37794 000044ED 3C07                    	cmp	al,SetDBCS ; 7		; dbcs vector set?

 37796 000044F1 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?
 37797 000044F5 7410                    	je	short sdbcsbc		; jump if so
 37798

 37817                                  getcountrydestination:
 37818                                  
 37819                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37820                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 37821                                  ;
 37822                                  ;input: al - data id
 37823                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 37824                                  ;on return:
 37825                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 37826                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 37827                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37828                                  
 37829                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37830                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 37831                                  
 37832 00004508 51                      	push	cx
 37833                                  	;add	di,74
 37834 00004509 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 37835                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 37836 0000450C 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 37837 0000450F 47                      	inc	di
 37838 00004510 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 37839                                  
 37840                                  getcntrydest:
 37841 00004511 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 37842 00004514 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 37843 00004516 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 37844 0000451A 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 37845                                  
 37846 0000451C 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 37847 0000451F EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 37848                                  
 37849                                  getcntrydest_1:
 37850                                  	;add	di,41
 37851 00004521 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 37852                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 37853 00004524 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 37854 00004526 F9                      	stc
 37855 00004527 EB0B                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 37856                                  
 37857                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 37858 00004529 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 37859 0000452B 7503                    	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 37860                                  
 37861 0000452D 47                      	inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 37862 0000452E EB04                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 37863                                  
 37864                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 37865 00004530 26C47D01                	les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 37866                                  
 37867                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 37868 00004534 59                      	pop	cx
 37869 00004535 C3                      	retn
 37870                                  
 37871                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37872                                  
 37873                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 37874                                  
 37875                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37876                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 37877                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 37878                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 37879                                  ;
 37880                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 37881                                  ;	 be moved.
 37882                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 37883                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 37884                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 37885                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 37886                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 37887                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 37888                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37889                                  
 37890 00004536 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 37891 00004537 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37892 0000453A F9                      	stc
 37893 0000453B CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37894 0000453D 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37895 0000453E 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37896                                  
 37897 00004540 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37898 00004542 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37899 00004544 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37900 00004546 F9                      	stc
 37901 00004547 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37902                                  ricb_exit:
 37903 00004549 C3                      	retn
 37904

 37906                                  
 37907                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 37908                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 37909                                  %if 0
 37910                                  
 37911                                  set_country_path:
 37912                                  
 37913                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37914                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37915                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37916                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37917                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37918                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37919                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37920                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37921                                  
 37922                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37923                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37924                                  
 37925                                  	push	si
 37926                                  
 37927                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37928                                  	push	es
 37929                                  	pop	ds
 37930                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37931                                  
 37932                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37933                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37934                                  
 37935                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37936                                  	inc	si
 37937                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37938                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37939                                  
 37940                                  scp_default_drv:
 37941                                  	mov	ah,19h
 37942                                  	int	21h
 37943                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37944                                  
 37945                                  scp_setdrv:
 37946                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37947                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 37948                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37949                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 37950                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 37951                                  
 37952                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37953                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37954                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37955                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37956                                  	jne	short scp_path
 37957                                  
 37958                                  scp_root_dir:
 37959                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37960                                  scp_path:
 37961                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37962                                  
 37963                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37964                                  scpath_exit:
 37965                                  
 37966                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37967                                  	push	es
 37968                                  	pop	ds
 37969                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37970                                  
 37971                                  	pop	si
 37972                                  	retn
 37973                                  
 37974                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37975                                  
 37976                                  chk_drive_letter:
 37977                                  
 37978                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 37979                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 37980                                  ;carry set if not.
 37981                                  
 37982                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 37983                                  
 37984                                  	push	ax
 37985                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 37986                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 37987                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 37988                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 37989                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 37990                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 37991                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 37992                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 37993                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37994                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 37995                                  
 37996                                  cdletter_no:
 37997                                  	stc
 37998                                  cdletter_exit:
 37999                                  	pop	ax
 38000                                  	retn
 38001                                  
 38002                                  %endif
 38003                                  
 38004                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38005                                  
 38006                                  move_asciiz:
 38007                                  
 38008                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 38009                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 38010                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 38011                                  
 38012                                  masciiz_loop:
 38013 0000454A A4                      	movsb
 38014 0000454B 807CFF00                	cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 38015 0000454F 75F9                    	jne	short masciiz_loop
 38016 00004551 C3                      	retn
 38017                                  
 38018                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38019                                  
 38020                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 38021                                  ;
 38022                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 38023                                  
 38024                                  badfil:
 38025 00004552 0E                      	push	cs
 38026 00004553 07                      	pop	es
 38027                                  
 38028 00004554 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 38029                                  badload:
 38030 00004556 BA[0D4B]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 38031 00004559 BB[CA4A]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 38032                                  prnerr:
 38033 0000455C 0E                      	push	cs
 38034 0000455D 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 38035 0000455E E81D00                  	call	print
 38036                                  prn1:
 38037 00004561 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 38038 00004564 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 38039 00004566 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 38040 00004568 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 38041 0000456A CD21                    	int	21h
 38042 0000456C 46                      	inc	si
 38043 0000456D EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 38044                                  prn2:
 38045 0000456F 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 38046 00004571 E80A00                  	call	print
 38047                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38048                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 38049 00004574 803E[5503]01            	cmp	byte [donotshownum],1
 38050                                  				; suppress line number when handling command.com
 38051                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1 
 38052 00004579 7407                    	je	short prnexit
 38053                                  	
 38054                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38055                                  	;call	error_line
 38056 0000457B E930E4                  	jmp	error_line
 38057                                  ;prnexit:
 38058                                  	;retn
 38059                                  
 38060                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38061                                  
 38062                                  print:
 38063 0000457E B409                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_STRING_OUTPUT ; 9
 38064 00004580 CD21                    	int	21h
 38065                                  prnexit:	; 18/12/2022
 38066 00004582 C3                      	retn
 38067                                  
 38068                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38069                                  
 38070                                  ;  open device pointed to by dx, al has access code
 38071                                  ;   if unable to open do a device open null device instead
 38072                                  
 38073                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38074                                  	; (SYSINIT:3764h)
 38075                                  open_dev:
 38076 00004583 E80500                  	call	open_file
 38077 00004586 7309                    	jnc	short open_dev3
 38078                                  
 38079                                  open_dev1:
 38080 00004588 BA[EC45]                	mov	dx,nuldev
 38081                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38082                                  	;call	open_file
 38083                                  ;of_retn:
 38084                                  	;retn
 38085                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38086                                  	;jmp	short open_file
 38087                                  open_file:
 38088 0000458B B43D                    	mov	ah,OPEN	; 3Dh
 38089 0000458D F9                      	stc
 38090 0000458E CD21                    	int	21h
 38091                                  of_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 38092 00004590 C3                      	retn
 38093                                  
 38094                                  open_dev3:
 38095 00004591 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; handle from open to bx
 38096                                  	;;xor	ax,ax			; get device info
 38097                                  	;;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 38098                                  	;mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8) ; 13/05/2019
 38099                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38100                                  	;xor	ax,ax
 38101                                  	;mov	ah,44h	; IOCTL
 38102                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38103 00004593 B80044                  	mov	ax,4400h ; IOCTL<<8 
 38104                                  
 38105 00004596 CD21                    	int	21h
 38106                                  
 38107 00004598 F6C280                  	test	dl,10000000b ; 80h
 38108 0000459B 75F3                    	jnz	short of_retn
 38109                                  
 38110 0000459D B43E                    	mov	ah,CLOSE ; 3Eh
 38111 0000459F CD21                    	int	21h
 38112 000045A1 EBE5                    	jmp	short open_dev1
 38113
